original: Dhātuvaṃso
analyzed: dhātu vaṃsaḥ

original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: 1. Tathāgatassāgamanakathā
analyzed: tathāgatassa āgamana kathā

original: Sambuddhamatulaṃ suddhaṃ dhammaṃ saṅghaṃ anuttaraṃ,
analyzed: sambuddham atulam suddham dhammam saṅgham anuttaram

original: Namassitvā pavakkhāmi dhātuvaṃsappakāsanaṃ;
analyzed: namassitvā pavakkhāmi dhātu vaṃsa pakāsanam

original: Tikkhattumagamā nātho laṅkādīpaṃ manoramaṃ,
analyzed: nāthaḥ laṅkā dīpam manoramam

original: Sattānaṃ hitamicchanto sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiṃ.
analyzed: sattānam hitam icchantaḥ sāsanassa cira ṭṭhitim

original: Tattha tikkhattumagamā nātho’ti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe parināmetvā appatisaraṇabhāvappattānaṃ
analyzed: tattha nātho ti anamatagge saṃsāra vaṭṭe parināmetvā appatisaraṇa bhāva pattānam

original: lokiyalokuttarasukhanipphādanabhāvena nātho patisaraṇa bhūto bhagavā buddhadhammasaṅgharatanattayamaggaṃ
analyzed: lokiya lokuttara sukha nipphādana bhāvena bhūtaḥ bhagavā buddha dhamma saṅgha ratanattaya maggam

original: ācikkhanto laṅkādīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ gato. Tattha paṭhamagamane tāva bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha
analyzed: ācikkhantaḥ laṅkā dīpam tikkhattum gataḥ tattha paṭhama gamane tāva bodhimaṇḍam āruyha

original: puratthīmābhimukho nisīditvā sūriye anatthamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā, paṭhamayāme
analyzed: puratthīma abhimukhaḥ nisīditvā sūriye māra balam vidhametvā paṭhama yāme

original: pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme cutupapātañāṇaṃ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne
analyzed: pubbenivāsa ñāṇam anussaritvā majjhima yāme cutupapāta ñāṇam patvā pacchima yāma avasāne

original: paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā dasabalacatuvesārajjādi guṇapatimaṇḍitaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ
analyzed: paccaya ākāre ñāṇam otāretvā dasa bala catu vesārajja ādi guṇa pati maṇḍitam sabbaññuta ñāṇam

original: paṭivijjhitvā bodhimaṇḍappadese anukkamena sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe
analyzed: paṭivijjhitvā bodhimaṇḍa ppadese anukkamena satta sattāham vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe

analyzed: ajapāla nigrodha mūle nisinnaḥ dhamma gambhira tam paccavekkhanena appa ussukka tam āpajjamāno

original: dasasahassa brahmaparivārena sahampatimahābrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano hutvā buddhacakkhunā
analyzed: brahma parivārena sahampati mahābrahmunā āyācita dhamma desanaḥ hutvā buddha cakkhunā

original: lokaṃ olokento pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ bahūpakārakaṃ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsīnaṃ

original: puraṃ gantvā aññākoṇaḍaññappamukhe aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amataṃ pāyento dhammacakkaṃ

original: pavattetvā pakkhassa pañcamiyaṃ pañcavaggiye sabbepi te arahante patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ
analyzed: pavattetvā pakkhassa pañcamiyam pañcavaggiye sabbe api te arahante patiṭṭhāpetvā tam

original: divasameva yasakulaputtassa rattibhāge sotāpattiphalaṃ datvā punadivase arahantaṃ
analyzed: divasam eva yasa kula puttassa ratti bhāge sotāpatti phalam da tvā puna divase arahantam

original: datvā tassa sahāyake catupaññāsajane arahantaṃ pāpetvā evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu
analyzed: da tvā tassa sahāyake catupaññāsa jane arahantam pāpetvā evam loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu

original: jātesu vutthavasso pavāretvā, ‘caratha bhikkhave cārika’ nti bhikkhu disāsu pesetvā
analyzed: jātesu vutthavasso pavāretvā caratha bhikkhave cārika nti bhikkhu disāsu pesetvā

original: sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe bhaddavaggiye kumāre tiṃsajane
analyzed: sayam uruvelam gacchantaḥ antarāmagge kappāsikavana saṇḍe bhaddavaggiye kumāre tiṃsa jane

analyzed: vinetvā ehi bhikkhu bhāvena pabbājetvā uruvelam gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriya sahassāni

original: dassento uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinento tattheva
analyzed: dassentaḥ uruvela kassapa ādayo sahassa jaṭila parivāre tebhātika jaṭile vinentaḥ tattha iva

original: vihāsi. Aparabhāge aṅgamagadharaṭṭhavāsino uruvelakassapassa mahāyaññaṃ upaṭṭhāpesuṃ.
analyzed: vihāsi aparabhāge aṅga magadha raṭṭha vāsinaḥ uruvela kassapassa mahā yaññam upaṭṭhāpesuṃ

original: So pana icchācārābhibhūto cintesi? “Sacāyaṃ mahāsamaṇo imassa samāgamassa majjhe
analyzed: saḥ pana icchā ācāra abhibhūtaḥ cintesi sacā ayam mahā samaṇaḥ imassa samāgamassa majjhe

analyzed: pāṭihāriyam kareyya lābha sakkāraḥ me parihāyissati ti tassa ivam pavatta ajjhāsayam

original: ñatvā pātova uttarakuruto bhikkhaṃ āharitvā anotatte āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā sāyanha

original: samaye phussapuṇṇamīuposathadivase laṅkādīpassatthāya laṅkādīpamupāgami.
analyzed: samaye phussa puṇṇamī uposatha divase laṅkā dīpaḥ satthāya laṅkā dīpam upāgami

analyzed: patiṭṭhāpetvā upari inda nīla maṇi thūpikāhi pidahitvā gandha mālā ādīhi pūjentaḥ vihāsi

analyzed: nāma kumāro tam abbhutam cetiyam disvā abhippasanno tam paṭicchādento tiṃsa hattham

analyzed: kañcuka cetiyam kārāpesi mahiyaṅgaṇa thūpassa patiṭṭhāna adhikāraḥ evam vitthārataḥ veditabbo

original: Bodhiṃ patvāna sambuddho bodhimūle narāsabho
analyzed: bodhim sambuddhaḥ bodhi mūle narāsabhaḥ

original: Nisīditvāna sattāhaṃ pāṭihīraṃ tato akā.
analyzed: nisīditvāna sattāham pāṭihīram tatas akā

original: Tato pubbuttare ṭhatvā pallaṅkā īsake jino
analyzed: tatas pubbuttare ṭhatvā pallaṅke īsake jino

original: Animisena nettena sattāhaṃ taṃ udikkhayi.
analyzed: animisena nettena satta aham tam

original: Caṅkamitvāna sattāhaṃ cakkhame ratanāmaye
analyzed: caṅkamitvāna sattāham cakkhame rata nāmaye

original: Vicinitvā jino dhammaṃ varaṃ so ratanāghare.
analyzed: vicinitvā jinaḥ dhammam varam saḥ ratanāghare

original: Ajapālamhi sattāhaṃ anubhosi samādhijaṃ
analyzed: ajapālamhi sattāham anubhosi samādhi jam

original: Ramme ca mucalindasmiṃ vimuttisukhamuttamaṃ.
analyzed: ramme ca mucalindasmim vimutti sukham uttamam

original: Rājāyatanamūlamhi sattarattindivaṃ vasī
analyzed: rāja āyatana mūlamhi vasī

original: Dantaponodakaṃ sakko adāsi satthuno tadā.
analyzed: sakkaḥ adāsi satthunaḥ tadā

original: Catuhi lokapālehi silāpattaṃ samāhaṭaṃ catukkamekakaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhānena nāyako.
analyzed: catuhi lokapālehi silā pattam samāhaṭam catukkam ekakam katvā adhiṭṭhānena nāyakaḥ

original: Vāṇijehi tadā dinnaṃ manthañca madhupiṇḍikaṃ
analyzed: vāṇijehi tadā dinnam mantham ca madhu piṇḍikam

original: Tahiṃ pana gahetvāna bhattakiccaṃ akā jino.
analyzed: tahim pana gahetvāna bhatta kiccam akāḥ jinaḥ

original: Gaṇhiṃsu saraṇaṃ tassa tapussabhallikā ubho
analyzed: gaṇhiṃsu saraṇam tassa tapussa bhallikāḥ ubho

original: Saraṇaṃ agamuṃ te taṃ satthu dinnasiroruhā.
analyzed: saraṇam agamum te tam satthu dinna siroruhā

original: Gantvāna te sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ thūpaṃ katvā manoramaṃ
analyzed: gantvāna te sakam raṭṭham thūpam katvā manoramam

original: Namassiṃsu ca pūjesuṃ dvebhātikopāsakā.
analyzed: namassiṃsu ca dvebhātika upāsakā

original: Iti so sattasattāhaṃ vītināmesi nāyako?
analyzed: iti saḥ sattasattāham vītināmesi nāyakaḥ

original: Brahmunā yācito satthā dhammacakkaṃ pavattituṃ.
analyzed: brahmunā yācitaḥ satthā dhammacakkam pavattitum

original: Tato bārāṇasiṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattayi
analyzed: tatas bārāṇasim gantvā dhamma cakkam pavattayi

original: Koṇḍañño desite dhamme sotāpattiphalaṃ labhi.
analyzed: koṇḍaññaḥ desite dhamme sotāpatti phalam

original: Brahmāno’ṭṭhārasakoṭī devatā ca asaṅkhiyā
analyzed: devatā ca asaṅkhiyā

original: Sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā dhammacakke pavattite.
analyzed: sotāpatti phalam pattāḥ dhammacakke pavattite

original: Patto pāṭipade vappo bhaddiyo dutiye phalaṃ,
analyzed: patto pāṭipade vappaḥ bhaddiyaḥ dutiye phalam

original: Tatiye ca mahānāmo assajī ca catutthīyaṃ.
analyzed: tatiye ca mahānāmaḥ assajī ca

original: Te sabbe sannipātetvā pañca’me pañcavaggiye,
analyzed: te sabbe sannipātetvā pañcame pañcavaggiye

original: Anattasuttaṃ desetvā bodhiyagga phalena te.
analyzed: anatta suttam desetvā bodhi yagga phalena te

original: Bodhiṃ pāpetvā pañcāhe yasattherādike jane,
analyzed: bodhim pāpetvā pañca ahe yasattheḥ ādike jane

original: Tato maggantare tiṃsakumāre bhaddavaggiye.
analyzed: tatas magga antare tiṃsa kumāre bhaddavaggiye

original: Uruvelaṃ tato gantvā uruvelāya saññitaṃ,
analyzed: uruvelam tatas gantvā uruvelāya saññitam

original: Uruvelenanuññāto uruvelanāgaṃ dami.
analyzed: uruvelena anuññātaḥ uruvela nāgam dami

original: Taṃ taṃ damī jino nāgaṃ damanena urādigaṃ,
analyzed: tam tam damī jinaḥ nāgam damanena urā digam

original: Tathāgataṃ nimantiṃsu disvā te pāṭihāriyaṃ.
analyzed: tathāgatam disvā te pāṭihāriyam

original: Idheva vanasaṇḍasmiṃ vihāretvā mahāmunī,
analyzed: idhā iva vana saṇḍasmin mahā munī

original: Upaṭṭhāhāmase sabbe niccabhattena taṃ mayaṃ.
analyzed: sabbe nicca bhattena tam mayam

original: Uruvelakassapassa mahāyaññe upaṭṭhite,
analyzed: uruvelakassapassa mahā yaññe upaṭṭhite

original: Tassa’ttano nāgamane icchācāraṃ vijāniya.
analyzed: na āgamane iccha ācāram vijāniya

original: Uttarakuruto bhikkhaṃ haritvā dipaduttamo,
analyzed: uttarakurutaḥ bhikkham haritvā dipada uttamo

original: Anotattadahe bhutvā sāyanha samaye sayaṃ.
analyzed: bhutvā sāyan ha samaye sayam

original: Bodhito navame māse phussapuṇṇamiyaṃ jino,
analyzed: bodhitaḥ navame māse phussapuṇṇamiyam jino

original: Laṅkādīpaṃ visodhetuṃ laṅkādīpamupāgami.
analyzed: laṅkā dīpam visodhetum laṅkā dīpam upāgami

original: Yakkhe damitvā sambuddho dhātuṃ datvāna nāyako,
analyzed: yakkhe damitvā sambuddhaḥ dhātum da tvāna nāyakaḥ

original: Gantvāna uruvelaṃ so vasī tattha vane jino.
analyzed: gantvānaḥ uru velam saḥ vasī tattha vane jino

original: Paṭhamagamanakathā samattā.
analyzed: paṭhama gamana kathā samattā

original: Dutiyagamane pana bodhito pañcame vasse jetavanamahāvihāre vasanto cūḷodara’mahodarānaṃ
analyzed: dutiya gamane pana bodhito pañcame vasse jetavana mahā vihāre vasanto cūḷodara mahodarānaṃ

original: mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ nāgānaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ nissāya saṅgāmaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ disvā sayaṃ
analyzed: mātula bhāgineyyānam nāgānam maṇi pallaṅkam nissāya saṅgāmam paccupaṭṭhitam disvā sayam

original: pattacīvaramādāya cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe uposathadivase nāgadīpaṃ gantvā tesaṃ saṅgāmamajjhe
analyzed: patta cīvaram ādāya cittamāsassa kāḷa pakkhe uposatha divase nāga dīpam gantvā tesam saṅgāma majjhe

original: ākāse nisinno andhakāraṃ akāsi. Te andhakārābhibhūte samassāsetvā ālokaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: ākāse nisinnaḥ andhakāram akāsi te andhakāra abhibhūte samassāsetvā ālokam dassetvā

original: attano saraṇabhūtānaṃ tesaṃ sāmaggikaraṇatthaṃ phalabharitarukkhaṃ cālento viya dhammaṃ
analyzed: attano saraṇa bhūtānam tesam sāmaggi karaṇa attham phala bharita rukkham cālentaḥ viya dhammaṃ

original: Mahākassapathero so bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato;

original: Sahādhiṭṭhānaṃ citakā dussāni ca vibhindiya;

original: Nikkhamiṃsu tadā pādā ghanamuttova candimā.

original: Uho hatthehi paggayha ṭhapetvā attano sire;

analyzed: vanditvā satthuno pāde khamāpetvā visajjayī

analyzed: puṇṇa candaḥ yathā abbham citakam tadā

original: Pāde antaradhāyante arodiṃsu mahājanā.
analyzed: pāde antaradhāyante arodiṃsu mahājanā

original: Parinibbutakālepi sakalaṃ kalunaṃ ahu;

original: Sumanamakuḷasabhāvā ca dhotamuttābhameva ca;

original: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇasaṃkāsā avasissaṃsu dhātuyo.

original: Dāṭhā catasso uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca sattimā;
analyzed: dāṭhā catassaḥ uṇhīsam akkhakā dve ca sattimā

original: Na vikiṇṇā tato sesā vippakiṇṇāva dhātuyo.
analyzed: na vikiṇṇā tatas sesāḥ vippakiṇṇā ava dhātuyaḥ

original: Ahosi tanukā dhātu sāsapabījamattikā;
analyzed: tanukā sāsapa bīja mattikā

original: Dhātuyo majjhimā majjhebhinnataṇḍulamattikā.
analyzed: majjhimā majjhebhinna taṇḍula mattikā

original: passitvā hasitti. Tena puṭṭho katakusalakammaṃ sabbaṃ vitthārena tassa ācikkhi. Rājā
analyzed: passitvā hasitti tena puṭṭhaḥ kata kusala kammam sabbam vitthārena tassa ācikkhi rājā

original: somanassappatto attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ datvā theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato. Koṭaraṭṭhakavihāraṃ
analyzed: somanassa pattaḥ attanaḥ uttarāsaṅgam da tvā theram vanditvā geham gataḥ koṭaraṭṭhaka vihāram

original: gantvā therassa sarīrajjhāpanaṃ kārāpetvā dhātuṃ ādāya cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahantaṃ
analyzed: gantvā therassa sarīra jhāpanam kārāpetvā dhātum ādāya cetiyam kārāpetvā mahantam

original: pūjaṃ katvā mahāgāmaṃ gato. Suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhapāpesi. Goṭhasamuddakucchiyaṃ
analyzed: pūjam katvā mahā gāmam gataḥ suvaṇṇam āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhapāpesi goṭha samudda kucchiyam

original: patta nāvāto vatthāni āharāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaratthāya dāpetvā mahādānaṃ
analyzed: vatthāni āharāpetvā bhikkhu saṅghassa cīvara tthāya dāpetvā mahādānam

original: pavattetvā mahāgāmasamīpe vihāraṃ kārāpetvā viharanto attano puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ
analyzed: pavattetvā mahā gāma samīpe vihāram kārāpetvā viharantaḥ attano puttam duṭṭha gāmaṇim

original: pakkosāpetvā; tāta, tvaṃ gantvā girimhi nagare nisīdā’ti vatvā amaccañcassa pituṭṭhāne
analyzed: pakkosāpetvā tāta tvam gantvā girimhi nagare nisīda ati vatvā amaccañcassa pituṭṭhāne

original: ṭhapetvā girinagaraṃ pāhesi. Taṃ disvā giriabhaya kumāro kumārena saddhiṃ āgatabaḷassa
analyzed: ṭhapetvā giri nagaram tam disvā giriabhaya kumāraḥ kumārena saddhim āgatabaḷassa

original: vatthāhārādīni dāpetvā mahantaṃ sammānaṃ akāsi. Rājakumāro giripabbatapāde vihāsi.
analyzed: vattha āhāra ādīni dāpetvā mahantam sammānam akāsi rāja kumāraḥ giri pabbata pāde vihāsi

original: Tato aparabhāge jātiṃ nissāya khattiyānaṃ vivādo ahosi. So abhayarājā kiṃ mevivādenā’ti
analyzed: tatas aparabhāge jātim nissāya khattiyānam vivādaḥ ahosi saḥ abhaya rājā kim me vivādena ati

original: attano bhariyāya somadeviyā saddhiṃ balavāhanaṃ gahetvā anukkamena gacchanto serunagare
analyzed: attanaḥ bhariyāya somadeviyā saddhim bala vāhanam gahetvā anukkamena gacchantaḥ seru nagare

original: rajjaṃ kārentaṃ attasahāyaṃ sivarājaṃ sandhāya tassa santikaṃ āgañji. So’pi sivarājā
analyzed: rajjam kārentam atta sahāyam siva rājam sandhāya tassa santikam āgañji saḥ api siva rājā

original: giriabhayaraññā saddhiṃ āgatabaḷassa mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā ahatavatthatilataṇḍulādīni
analyzed: giriabhaya raññā saddhim āgatabaḷassa mahantam sakkāram kāretvā ahata vattha tila taṇḍula ādīni

original: āharāpetvā dāpesi. Katipāhaccaye; samma, kasmā āgatosi’ti pucchi. So āgatakāraṇaṃ
analyzed: āharāpetvā dāpesi kati pāhaccaye samma kasmai āgataḥ asi iti pucchi saḥ āgata kāraṇam

original: sabbamassa ācikkhi. Bhaddakaṃ samma, te kataṃ āgantabbameva āgato. Ahaṃ te kattabbaṃ
analyzed: sabbam assa ācikkhi bhaddakam samma te katam āgantabbam eva āgataḥ aham te kattabbam

original: jānissāmi. Tvaṃ mā cintayī’ti vatvā tassa vasanatthāya nagarabhūmiṃ gavesanto sarakoṭiyaṃ
analyzed: jānissāmi tvam mā cintayi iti vatvā tassa vasana atthāya nagara bhūmim gavesanto sarakoṭiyam

original: atiramaṇīyabhūmiṃ passitvā tasmiṃ bhūmibhāge so nagaraṃ māpetvā deviyā ekasadisanāmaṃ
analyzed: ati ramaṇīya bhūmim passitvā tasmin bhūmi bhāge saḥ nagaram māpetvā deviyāḥ ekasadisa nāmam

original: karissāmī’ti somanagaranti nāmaṃ akāsi. Taṃ nagaraṃ susamiddhaṃ sampannadhanadhaññādīhi
analyzed: karissāmi iti somanagaranti nāmam akāsi tam nagaram su samiddham sampanna dhana dhañña ādīhi

original: upakaraṇehi dvāraṭṭālakagopuraparikhāpokkhara-ṇiyādīhi sahitaṃ hatthiassarathapattiādīhi
analyzed: upakaraṇehi dvāra aṭṭālaka gopura parikhā pokkharaṇiya ādīhi sahitam hatthi assa ratha patti ādīhi

original: samākulaṃ saṅkhapaṇavabherisaddādīhi samākiṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi. So abhayo ciraṃ somanagare
analyzed: samākulam saṅkha paṇava bheri sadda ādīhi samākiṇṇam nagaram ahosi saḥ abhayaḥ ciram soma nagare

original: mahantaṃ issariyaṃ anubhavanto vihāsi.
analyzed: mahantam issariyam anubhavantaḥ vihāsi

original: Athāparasmiṃ kāle somadevī raññā saddhiṃ kathesi; ayya amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ cetiyañca
analyzed: atha aparasmin kāle somadevī raññā saddhim kathesi ayya amhākam paṭisaraṇam cetiyañca

original: vihārañca kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti. Bhaddakaṃ te kathitanti somanassappatto hutvā vihārabhūmiṃ
analyzed: vihārañca kāretum vaṭṭati iti bhaddakam te kathitan ti somanassa pattaḥ hutvā vihāra bhūmiṃ

original: gavesanto nagarato nātidure nāccāsanne mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ atthi. Taṃ passituṃ gato.
analyzed: gavesantaḥ nagarataḥ na ati dure na acca āsanne mahantam sāla vanam atthi tam passitum gataḥ

original: Tadā tasmiṃ sālavane mahāariṭṭhattherassa vaṃse mahāmahindatthero nāma eko thero
analyzed: tadā tasmin sāla vane mahāariṭṭha therassa vaṃse mahāmahinda theraḥ nāma ekaḥ theraḥ

original: atthi. So saṭṭhimatte bhikkhū gahetvā viharati. Taṃ disvā iriyāpathe pasanno theraṃ
analyzed: atthi so saṭṭhimatte bhikkhū gahetvā viharati tam disvā iriyāpathe pasanno theram

original: evamāha; ‘ayya tumhākaṃ imasmiṃ sālavane vihāraṃ karissāmi’ti. Thero tassa vacanaṃ
analyzed: evam āha ayya tumhākam imasmin sāla vane vihāram karissāmi iti thero tassa vacanaṃ

original: sutvā tuṇhīhāvena adhivāsesi. Rājā somanassappatto theraṃ vanditvā nagarameva gantvā
analyzed: sutvā tuṇhī hāvena adhivāsesi rājā somanassappattaḥ theram vanditvā nagaram eva gantvā

original: somadeviṃ āmantetvā; bhaddesomadevi, amhākaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ patto. Vihārakaraṇatthāya
analyzed: somadevim āmantetvā bhadde somadevi amhākam manorathaḥ matthakam pattaḥ vihāra karaṇa tthāya

original: manāpo bhūmibhāgo laddho. Tattha ca mahindo nāma thero samaṇānaṃ saṭṭhimattaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: manāpaḥ bhūmi bhāgaḥ laddho tattha ca mahindaḥ nāma thero samaṇānam gahetvā

original: viharati. Taṃ vanditvā viharaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā āgato. Tattha vihāraṃ karissāmī’ti
analyzed: viharati tam vanditvā viharaṇa atthāya paṭiññam gahetvā āgataḥ tattha vihāram karissāmi iti

original: āha. Sā taṃ sutvā somanassappattā sādhū’ti sampaṭicchi. Punadivase deviyā saddhiṃ
analyzed: āha sā tam sutvā so manassa pattā sādhu iti sampaṭicchi puna divase deviyā saddhim

original: therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Thero tesaṃ mahāsamayasuttaṃ
analyzed: therassa santikam gantvā vanditvā ekamantam nisīdi thero tesam mahāsamaya suttaṃ

original: kathesi. Te ubho’pi dhammaṃ sutvā somanassajātā ahesuṃ. Atha rājā ayya dhātuṃ kuto
analyzed: kathesi te ubho pi dhammam sutvā somanassa jātāḥ ahesum atha rājā ayya dhātum kutas

original: labhissāmā’ti theraṃ pucchi. Mā cintayi mahārāja, dhātuṃ amhe jānissāmā’ti ācikkhi.
analyzed: labhissāma iti theram pucchi mā cintayi mahā rāja dhātum amhe jānissāma ati ācikkhi

original: So tato paṭṭhāya vihārabhumiṃ sodhāpetvā khāṇukaṇṭakādayo nīharitvā bheritalamiva
analyzed: saḥ tatas paṭṭhāya vihāra bhumim sodhāpetvā khāṇu kaṇṭaka ādayaḥ nīharitvā bheri talam iva

original: ramaṇīyaṃ samaṃ kārāpetvā iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā iṭṭhacitaṃ kārāpetvā cetiyakammaṃ
analyzed: ramaṇīyam samam kārāpetvā iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakim pakkosāpetvā iṭṭha citam kārāpetvā cetiya kammaṃ

original: paṭṭhapesi. Vaḍḍhakī cetiyaṃ cinanto katipāhena pupphādhānattayaṃ niṭṭhapetvā dhātugabbhe
analyzed: paṭṭhapesi vaḍḍhakī cetiyam cinantaḥ kati pāhena puppha ādhāna ttayam niṭṭhapetvā dhātu gabbhe

original: sabbaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhapetvā rañño paṭivedesi. Rājā, āgantvā therassa ārocesi.
analyzed: sabbam kattabbam kammam niṭṭhapetvā raññaḥ paṭivedesi rājā āgantvā therassa ārocesi

original: Niṭṭhāpito ayya dhātu gabbho’ti. Thero rañño vacanaṃ sutvā attanā pariharitaṃ tathāgatassa
analyzed: niṭṭhāpitaḥ ayya dhātu gabbhaḥ ti theraḥ raññaḥ vacanam sutvā attanā pariharitam tathāgatassa

original: dakkhiṇadāṭhādhātuṃ tassa adāsi. Rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā sunakkhattena sumuhuttena mahatā
analyzed: dakkhiṇa dāṭhā dhātum tassa adāsi rājā dhātum gahetvā su nakkhattena su muhuttena mahatā

original: parivārena dhātugabbhe nidahitvā atimanoramaṃ udakabubbuḷakelāsakuṭapaṭibhāgaṃ cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
analyzed: parivārena dhātu gabbhe nidahitvā ati manoramam udaka bubbuḷa kelāsa kuṭa paṭibhāgam cetiyam kārāpesi

original: Saddhādiguṇasampanno lokasāsanarakkhako;
analyzed: saddhā ādi guṇa sampannaḥ loka sāsana rakkhako

original: Sacetiyaṃ mahārājā kārāpesi vihārakaṃ.
analyzed: sa cetiyam mahā rājā kārāpesi vihārakam

original: Tato therassa santike saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhunaṃ atthāya saṭṭhimattāni pariveṇāni
analyzed: tatas therassa santike saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhunam atthāya saṭṭhimattāni pariveṇāni

original: kārāpetvā dvāraṭṭālakapākārehi sobhitaṃ vihāraṃ niṭṭhapetvā attano deviyā ekanāmaṃ
analyzed: kārāpetvā dvāra aṭṭālaka pākārehi sobhitam vihāram niṭṭhapetvā attanaḥ deviyāḥ eka nāmam

original: katvā mahindattherassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā gandhamālādhūpadhajehi pūjaṃ karonto divasassa
analyzed: katvā mahinda therassa dakkhiṇa udakam da tvā gandha mālā dhūpa dhajehi pūjam karontaḥ divasassa

original: tikkhattuṃ dhātupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dānādīni puññāni kurumāno giriabhayarājā mahantaṃ
analyzed: tikkhattum dhātupaṭṭhānam gantvā dāna ādīni puññāni kurumānaḥ giriabhaya rājā mahantam

original: sampattiṃ anubhavamāno somanagaraṃ paṭivasati.
analyzed: sampattim anubhavamānaḥ soma nagaram paṭivasati

original: (Nagare somanāmamhi ramaṇīye manorame;
analyzed: nagare ramaṇīye manorame

original: Deviyā saha modanto rajjaṃ kāresi nāyako.)
analyzed: deviyā saha modantaḥ rajjam kāresi nāyako

original: Tato vihāradeviyā bhātā cullapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero nāma ekadivasaṃ kākavaṇṇatissamahārañño
analyzed: tatas vihāradeviyāḥ bhātā cullapiṇḍapātiya tissa theraḥ nāma eka divasam kākavaṇṇa tissa mahārañño

original: āyusaṅkhāramolokento na cirappavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā punadivase rañño santikaṃ gantvā
analyzed: āyu saṅkhāram olokentaḥ na cira pavattana bhāvam ñatvā puna divase rañño santikam gantvā

original: tena saddhiṃ kathesi. Mahārāja tumhākaṃ nalāṭadhātuyā satthārā byākaraṇaṃ dinnaṃ;’mahāvālukagaṅgāya
analyzed: tena saddhim kathesi mahā rāja tumhākam nalāṭa dhātuyā satthārā byākaraṇam dinnam mahā vālukagaṅgāya

original: dakkhiṇabhāge seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake anāgate kākavaṇṇatisso
analyzed: dakkhiṇa bhāge seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake anāgate kākavaṇṇatisso

original: nāma mahārājā mayhaṃ nalāṭadhātuṃ patiṭṭhapessatī’ti vatvā taṃ sandhāya bhagavā samāpattiṃ

original: samāpajjitvā gato. Tassa vacanaṃ manasikarohī’ti āha. Tassa kathaṃ sutvā amhākaṃ
analyzed: samāpajjitvā gataḥ tassa vacanam manasikarohi iti āha tassa katham sutvā amhākam

original: kusalasampattiṃ avināsetvā ayyassa vacanamuddissa cetiyaṃ kārāpanatthāya gantabbanti
analyzed: kusala sampattim a vināsetvā ayyassa vacanam uddissa cetiyam kārāpana thāya gantabbanti

original: mantvā bhaddakaṃ ayyā’ti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attano puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ
analyzed: mantvā bhaddakam ayyā iti therassa vacanam sampaṭicchitvā attano puttam duṭṭhagāmaṇim

original: girinagarato pakkosāpetvā mahāgāme nisīdāpetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi; ahaṃ mahāvālukāya
analyzed: giri nagarataḥ pakkosāpetvā mahā gāme nisīdāpetvā nagare bherim carāpesi aham mahā vālukāya

original: gaṅgāya samīpe seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake cetiyaṃ kārāpanatthāya
analyzed: gaṅgāya samīpe seru nāma dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍiyā matthake cetiyam kārāpana tthāya

original: gamissāmi, sabbaseniyo ca mahā jano ca mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantu’ti vatvā rājā culapiṇḍapātiyatissattherassa
analyzed: gamissāmi sabbaseniyaḥ ca mahā janaḥ ca mayā saddhim āgacchantu ti vatvā rājā cula piṇḍapātiya tissa therassa

original: tissamahāvihāre sāgalattherassa ca santikaṃ gantvā bhante tumhākaṃ parivāre pañcasatamatte
analyzed: tissa mahāvihāre sāgala ttherassa ca santikam gantvā bhante tumhākam parivāre pañca sata matte

original: bhikkhu gahetvā dhātuṃ upaṭṭhahantā mayā saddhiṃyeva āgacchathā’ti vatvā bhaddamāse
analyzed: bhikkhu gahetvā dhātum upaṭṭhahantā mayā saddhiṃyeva āgacchatha ati vatvā bhaddamāse

original: bhaddadivase sunakkhatte sumuhutte bandhāvāraṃ sajjetvā dhātugharato dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
analyzed: bhadda divase su nakkhatte su muhutte bandhāvāram sajjetvā dhātu gharataḥ dhātu karaṇḍakam

original: nīharitvā susajjitarathe ṭhapetvā upari setacchattañca katvā purato purato ratanamaṇaḍape
analyzed: nīharitvā su sajjita rathe ṭhapetvā upari seta chattam ca katvā puratas puratas ratana maṇaḍape

original: kārāpetvā puretaramakāsi.
analyzed: kārā petvā puretaram akāsi

original: Tato rājā puttaṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇiṃ pakkosāpetvā anusāsitvā puttaṃ saddhātissakumārañca
analyzed: tatas rājā puttam duṭṭha gāmaṇim pakkosāpetvā anusāsitvā puttam saddhātissa kumāram ca

original: vihāradeviñca gahetvā sīghaṃ nikkhami. Cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero ca attano parivāre
analyzed: vihāradevim ca gahetvā sīgham nikkhami cūḷa piṇḍapātiya tissa thero ca attano parivāre

original: pañcasatabhikkhū gahetvā dhātuṃ upaṭṭhahanto pacchato āgañchi. Sabbaseniyo ca rājā
analyzed: pañca sata bhikkhū gahetvā dhātum upaṭṭhahantaḥ pacchatas āgañchi sabbaseniyaḥ ca rājā

original: ca bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhiṃ gantvā dīghavāpiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
analyzed: ca bhikkhu saṅghassa mahādānam da tvā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim gantvā dīgha vāpim pāpuṇiṃsu

original: Tasmiṃ saddhātissakumāraṃ nisīdāpetvā anukkamena āgantvā sumanamālāpiṭṭhiyaṃ khandhavāraṃ
analyzed: tasmin saddhātissa kumāram nisīdāpetvā anukkamena āgantvā sumana mālā piṭṭhiyam khandhavāram

original: bandhitvā nisīdi. Kasmā pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ evaṃ nāmakaṃ jātanti. Sumananāgarājā sattadivasāni
analyzed: bandhitvā nisīdi sumana nāga rājā satta divasāni

original: nāgasampattiṃ abhiramamāno (nalāṭadhātuṃ vissari.) Sattāhaccayena nalāṭadhātuṃ anussaritvā
analyzed: nāga sampattim abhiramamānaḥ nalāṭa dhātum vissari sattā ahaccayena nalāṭa dhātum anussaritvā

original: pacchā āvajjamāno rañño dhātuṃ gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahantaṃ somanassaṃ patto
analyzed: pacchā āvajjamānaḥ raññaḥ dhātum gahetvā āgata bhāvam ñatvā mahantam somanassam patto

original: mahantajjhāsayo attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā dhātupaṭipathaṃ gantvā
analyzed: parivāre chakoṭi matte nāge gahetvā dhātu paṭi patham gantvā

original: dhātupatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāneva pathaviyaṃ nābhippamāṇato sumanamālāvassaṃ vassesi. Tasmā
analyzed: dhātu patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānā iva pathaviyam sumana mālā vassam vassesi tasmā

original: taṃ ṭhānaṃ sumanamālāpiṭṭhiti jātaṃ. Punadivase rājā dhātuṃ gahetvā varāha nāma soṇḍiṃ
analyzed: tam ṭhānam jātam puna divase rājā dhātum gahetvā varāha nāma soṇḍim

original: pāpuṇi. Sampattāya dhātuyā tasmiṃ ṭhāne sumananāgarājā rathacakke yāva nābhiṃ tāva
analyzed: sampattāya dhātuyā tasmin ṭhāne sumana nāga rājā ratha cakke yāva nābhim tāva

original: osīdāpetvā aparivattanaṃ akāsi. Taṃ disvā rājā saṃvegappatto theraṃ pucchi. Mā bhāyi
analyzed: osīdāpetvā aparivattanam akāsi tam disvā rājā saṃvega pattaḥ theram pucchi mā bhāyi

original: mahārāja, dhātu patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ āgato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhahissatī’ti āha.
analyzed: mahā rāja dhātu patiṭṭhāna ṭhānam āgataḥ imasmin ṭhāne patiṭṭhahissati iti āha

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā dhātupatiṭṭhāna bhūmibhāgaṃ bhavissatī’ti cintetvā tattheva senaṃnivesetvā

original: iṭṭhakabhumiṃ gato. Somanagare giriabhayarājāpi attano senaṅgehi parivāretvā iṭṭhakabhumiṃ
analyzed: iṭṭhaka bhumim gataḥ soma nagare giriabhaya rājā api senaṅgehi parivāretvā iṭṭhaka bhumim

original: gato. Tesaṃ samaṇa brāhmaṇānaṃ rājabaḷānañca sampiṇḍitattā so piṭṭhipāsāṇo balavāhano
analyzed: gataḥ tesam samaṇa brāhmaṇānam sampiṇḍita ttā saḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ bala vāhano

original: nāma jāto. Te sabbe iṭṭhakabhumiṃ samosariṃsu. Thero iṭṭhakarāsiṃ oloketvā rājānaṃ
analyzed: nāma jātaḥ te sabbe iṭṭhaka bhumim samosariṃsu theraḥ iṭṭhaka rāsim oloketvā rājānam

original: evamāha? Mahārāja, ayaṃ iṭṭhakarāsi cetiye sabbakammatthāya pahotī’ti. Rājā attamano
analyzed: evam āha mahā rāja ayam iṭṭhakarā asi cetiye sabba kammatthāya pahoti iti rājā attamano

original: senaṅgaparivuto sayameva paṭhamaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ disvā sesarājāno ca amaccādayo
analyzed: senaṅga parivutaḥ sayam eva paṭhamam iṭṭhakam gaṇhi tam disvā sesa rājāno ca amacca ādayo

original: ca parisā ca sabbe bhikkhu ca iṭṭhakāni gaṇhiṃsu tasmiṃ kāle bhāraṃ ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ
analyzed: ca parisā ca sabbe bhikkhu ca iṭṭhakāni gaṇhiṃsu tasmin kāle bhāram ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ

original: papañcaṃ bhavissatī’ti rājā cintesi. Thero tassa cittaṃ jānitvā evamāha? Mā cintayittha
analyzed: papañcam bhavissati iti rājā cintesi thero tassa cittam jānitvā evam āha mā cintayittha

original: mahārāja, iṭṭhakāni gahetvā gaccha. Pacchā devanāgādayo iṭṭhakabhumito paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: mahā rāja iṭṭhakāni gahetvā gaccha pacchā deva nāga ādayo iṭṭhaka bhumito paṭṭhāya

original: cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ nirantarā ṭhitā āharissantī’ti. Te āharitvā cetiyaṭṭhāne rāsiṃ karonti.
analyzed: cetiya ṭṭhānam nirantarā ṭhitāḥ āharissanti iti te āharitvā cetiya ṭṭhāne rāsim karonti

original: Teneva nīyāmena yāva cetiyassa niṭṭhaṅgamā tāva devanāgasupaṇṇādayo nirantaraṃ ṭhatvā
analyzed: tena iva nīyāmena yāva cetiyassa niṭṭhaṅgamā tāva deva nāga supaṇṇa ādayaḥ nirantaram

original: iṭṭhakāni āharitvā cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāneva catusu disāsu rāsiṃ akaṃsu.
analyzed: iṭṭhakāni āharitvā cetiya karaṇa ṭṭhānā iva catusu disāsu rāsim akaṃsu

original: Tato rājā sabbe iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī rāsiṃ kārāpetvā tesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ antare jayasenaṃ
analyzed: tatas rājā sabbe iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakī rāsim kārāpetvā tesam vaḍḍhakīnam antare jayasenam

original: nāma iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakiṃ parigaṇhitvā tassa pana satasahassagghanakāni dve sāṭakāni
analyzed: nāma iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakim parigaṇhitvā tassa pana sata sahassa gghanakāni dve sāṭakāni

original: kahāpaṇasatasahassāni ca suvaṇṇakuṇḍalādayo ābharaṇāni ca dāpesi. Tassa parivārānaṃ
analyzed: kahāpaṇa sata sahassāni ca suvaṇṇa kuṇḍala ādayaḥ ābharaṇāni ca dāpesi tassa

original: vaḍḍhakīnaṃ ahatavatthādīni sabbupakaraṇāni dāpesi. Anekavidhaṃ mahantaṃ sammānaṃ
analyzed: vaḍḍhakīnam ahata vattha ādīni sabba upakaraṇāni dāpesi anekavidham mahantam sammānam

original: kāretvā therena saddhiṃ mantento; ayya ajja visākhapuṇṇamī uposathadivaso, tasmā
analyzed: kāretvā therena saddhim mantentaḥ ayya ajja visākha puṇṇamī uposatha divasaḥ tasmai

original: nalāṭadhātuyā maṅgalaṃ karitvā cetiyaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti āha.
analyzed: nalāṭa dhātuyāḥ maṅgalam karitvā cetiya ṭṭhāne iṭṭhakam patiṭṭhāpetum vaṭṭati iti āha

original: Taṃ sutvā thero; bhaddakaṃ mahārāja, buddhassa bhagavato jātadivaso’ti vatvā cetiyakammakaraṇatthāya
analyzed: tam sutvā theraḥ bhaddakam mahā rāja buddhassa bhagavataḥ jāta divasaḥ iti vatvā cetiya kamma karaṇa tthāya

original: pañca jane gaṇhi. Tesu eko varadevo nāma, eko saṅkho nāma, eko vijjo nāma, eko pussadevo
analyzed: pañca jane gaṇhi tesu ekaḥ varadevaḥ nāma ekaḥ saṅkhaḥ nāma ekaḥ vijjaḥ nāma ekaḥ pussadevaḥ

original: nāma, eko mahādevo nāma. Imesaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ maṅgalaṃ kārāpetvā chaṇavesaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: nāma ekaḥ mahādevaḥ nāma imesam vaḍḍhakīnam maṅgalam kārāpetvā chaṇa vesam gahetvā

original: sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkārāpetvā rājā sayampi sabbālaṅkārena patimaṇḍito maṅgalavidhānaṃ
analyzed: sabba alaṅkārena rājā sayam pi sabba alaṅkārena pati maṇḍitaḥ maṅgala vidhānam

original: kārāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catusu
analyzed: kārāpetvā bhikkhu saṅgham gandha mālā ādīhi pūjetvā tikkhattum padakkhiṇam katvā catusu

original: ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā vijamhetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ
analyzed: ṭhānesu pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā vijamhetvā suvaṇṇa ghaṭṭhānam pavisitvā suvaṇṇa khacitam

original: maṇimuttāratanamayaṃ paribbhamanadaṇḍaṃ jīvamānakamātāpitarena ubhatosumaṇḍitapasādhitena
analyzed: maṇim uttā ratana mayam paribbhamana daṇḍam jīvamānaka mātā pitarena

original: abhimaṅgalasammatena amaccaputtena gāhāpetvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ tattha karonto sayampi
analyzed: abhimaṅgalasammatena amacca puttena gāhāpetvā mahantam cetiyam tattha karonto sayam pi

original: paribbhamanadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā parikammakatabhumiyaṃ paribbhamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: paribbhamana daṇḍam gahetvā parikammakata bhumiyam paribbhamitvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Tato mahāvaḍḍhakī sunakkhattena sumuhuttena cetiyaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
analyzed: tatas mahāvaḍḍhakī su nakkhattena su muhuttena cetiyaṭṭhāne iṭṭhakam patiṭṭhāpesi

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe catunahutādhika dviyojana satasahassabahulā ayaṃ mahāpathavī sādhukāraṃ
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe dvi yojana sata sahassa bahulā ayam mahā pathavī sādhukāram

original: pavattentī viya mahānādaṃ pavattesi. Devamanussā divase divase pahonaka-mattikaṃ
analyzed: pavattentī viya mahā nādam pavattesi deva manussāḥ divase divase pahonaka mattikam

original: nisadena piṃsitvā suppehi papphoṭhetvā denti. Evaṃ karonto katipayeneva divasena
analyzed: nisadena piṃsitvā suppehi papphoṭhetvā denti evam karontaḥ katipayena iva divasena

original: pupphādhānattayaṃ cinitvā mahābhikkhu saṅghassa nivedesi. Taṃ sutvā saṅgho cunduttaranāmake
analyzed: puppha ādhāna ttayam cinitvā mahā bhikkhu saṅghassa nivedesi tam sutvā saṅghaḥ cunduttara nāmake

original: dve sāmaṇere āṇāpesi? Tumhe himavantaṃ gantvā medavaṇṇapāsāṇe āharathā’ti. Te pana

original: sāmaṇerā jātiyā soḷasavassikā chaḷabhiññāppabhedena paṭisambhidappattā. Mahākhīṇāsavabhikkhusaṅghassa

original: santikā bhikkhusaṅghassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavantato attano
analyzed: santikā bhikkhu saṅghassa vacanam sampaṭicchitvā ākāsam abbhuggantvā himavantataḥ attanaḥ

analyzed: pattharitvā catusu passesu cattāraḥ pāsāṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā aparam dhātu gabbham pidahitum

original: adassanaṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
analyzed: a dassanam katvā ṭhapayiṃsu

original: Tadā rājā dhātugabbhe kammaṃ niṭṭhapento nava koṭippamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpetvā suvaṇṇakārānaṃ

analyzed: datvā dhātu gabbhassa iṭṭhakāni karotha ati āṇāpesi te suvaṇṇa kārāḥ dīghataḥ ratana ppamāṇam

analyzed: puthulatas vidatthi ippamāṇam bahalatas catur aṅgula ppamāṇam iṭṭhakam katvā dhātu gabbham

original: ciniṃsu. Taṃ pana dhātugabbhaṃ uccato soḷasahatthaṃ vitthāratopi itocito dasadasaratanaṃ
analyzed: tam pana dhātu gabbham uccatas soḷasa hattham vitthārataḥ api itocitaḥ dasa dasa ratanam

original: katvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakeheva niṭṭhapetvā dhātugabbhassa majjhe sattaratanamayaṃ sineruṃ
analyzed: katvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakehi iva niṭṭhapetvā dhātu gabbhassa majjhe satta ratana mayam sinerum

original: kārāpetvā sinerussa upari jātihiṅgulakena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ sattaratanena pāricchattakarukkhaṃ
analyzed: kārāpetvā sinerussa upari jāti hiṅgulakena paṇḍu kambala silā āsanam satta ratanena pāricchattaka rukkham

original: rajatamayaṃ setacchattaṃ brahmunā gāhāpetvā satthuno paṭimāya upari dhāriyamānaṃ
analyzed: rajata mayam seta chattam brahmunā gāhāpetvā satthuno paṭimāya upari dhāriyamānam

analyzed: sineru pāda mūle gandha kalala pūrita nīluppala vibhu sita suvaṇṇa maya aṭṭhuttara sata ghaṭa pantiyo

original: ṭhapāpesi. Tadanantaraṃ gandhakalalapūritaratnapadumavibhusitarajatamayaaṭṭhuttara-
analyzed: tad anantaram gandha kalala pūrita ratna paduma vibhu sita rajata maya aṭṭhuttara

original: sataghaṭapantiyo ṭhapāpesi. Tadanantaraṃ gandhakalalapūrita setuppalamālāvibhusitamaṇimayaaṭṭhuttarasataghaṭapattiyo
analyzed: tad anantaram gandha kalala pūrita setu ppala mālā vibhusita maṇi maya aṭṭhuttara sata ghaṭa pattiyo

analyzed: tad anantaram

original: ṭhapāpesi. Tadanantaraṃ gandhakalalapūritacampakapupphavibhusitalohitaṅkamayaaṭṭhuttarasata
analyzed: tad anantaram gandha kalala pūrita campaka puppha vibhu sita lohitaṅka maya aṭṭhuttara sata

original: ghaṭapattiyo ṭhapāpesi. Tadanantaraṃ gandhakalalapūritapañcuppalavibhusitamattikāmayaaṭṭhuttarasataghaṭapantiyo
analyzed: tad anantaram gandha kalala pūrita pañcuppala vibhusita mattikā maya aṭṭhuttara sata ghaṭa pantiyo

original: ṭhapāpesi. Tāsaṃ ghaṭapantīnaṃ antare gandhakalalapūritasattaratanamayasarāvake ṭhapāpesi.
analyzed: tāsam ghaṭapantīnam antare gandha kalala pūrita satta ratana maya sarāvake

original: Kañcanamaya-sattaratanamaya-vicittamālālatāpuṇṇaghaṭasirivacchanandiyāvaṭṭabhaddapīṭhādayo
analyzed: kañcana maya satta ratana maya vicitta mālā latā puṇṇa ghaṭa sirivaccha nandiyā vaṭṭa bhadda pīṭha ādayaḥ

original: ca hatthiassasīhavyagghosabhapantiādayo ca kāresi. Devorohaṇaṃ yamakapāṭihīrādayo
analyzed: ca ca ca kāresi yamaka pāṭihīra ādayaḥ

original: dhanapāla-aṅgulimāla-āḷavakadamanādayo, sāriputta-moggallāna-mahākassapattherādayo,

original: asītimahāsāvakarūpādīni ca kārāpesi. Sinerussa majjhimabhāge tārāgaṇaparivāritaṃ

original: Tato sinerussa matthake pāricchattakamule paṇḍukambalasilāsane amhākaṃ satthuno paṭimaṃ

original: sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ desanākārena nisīdāpesi. Tassa vīsatinakhā akkhitalānaṃ

original: setaṭṭhānāni jātiphalikamayāni. Aṅguliyo suvaṇṇamayā hatthapādatalāni ca dantāvaraṇāni

original: ca akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhānāni ca jātipavāḷamayāni, kesamassubhamukaṭṭhānāni indanīlamayāni,

original: samacattālīsa dantā vajiramayā ahesuṃ. Uṇṇalomaṃ pana suvaṇṇa bhittiyaṃ ṭhapitarajatabubbuḷavilāsaṃ

original: kiṃkiṇijālaṃ parikkhipāpesi.
analyzed: kiṃkiṇi jālam parikkhipāpesi

analyzed: ca sahampati mahā brahma ādayaḥ ca vessantara jātakam karonto

analyzed: ca ca ca ca ca

original: kārāpetvā te sabbe dhātu gabbhe patiṭṭhāpesi.

original: Dhātugabbhavaṇṇaṇā samattā.
analyzed: dhātu gabbha vaṇṇaṇā samattā

original: Evaṃ dhātugabbhe pūjāvidhānaṃ suvibhattaṃ sumanoramaṃ kārāpetvā therena saddhiṃ kathesi?
analyzed: evam dhātugabbhe pūjā vidhānam suvibhattam su manoramam kārāpetvā therena saddhim kathesi

original: Bhante dhātugabbhe mayā kattabbaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ. Sve rohiṇīnakkhattena dhātu nidhānaṃ
analyzed: bhante dhātu gabbhe mayā kattabbam niṭṭhāpitam sve rohiṇīnakkhattena dhātu nidhānam

original: karissāmī. Ayyā pana kesadhātuyo gahetvā āgacchantuti. Tissattherassa bhāramakāsi.
analyzed: karissāmi ayyā pana kesadhātuyaḥ gahetvā āgacchantu ti tissa therassa bhāram akāsi

original: Thero taṃ sutvā bhaddakaṃ mahārāja, kesadhātuyo vicinitvā āharāpessāmāti vatvā attano
analyzed: theraḥ tam sutvā bhaddakam mahā rāja kesadhātuyaḥ vicinitvā āhara āpessāma ati vatvā attano

original: saddhivihārikaṃ sivattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā āvuso bhūmindharanāgavimāne jayaseno nāma
analyzed: saddhivihārikam siva theram pakkosāpetvā āvuso bhūmindhara nāga vimāne jayasenaḥ nāma

original: nāgarājā vasati. Tassa santike (kesadhātuyo santi.) Tapussa bhallikānaṃ dvebhātikavāṇijānaṃ
analyzed: nāga rājā vasati tassa santike kesadhātuyaḥ santi bhallikānam dvebhātika vāṇijānam

original: paricaraṇakāle tesaṃ pamādaṃ ñatvā nāgarājā dve kesadhātuyo gahetvā nāgabhavane ṭhapesi.
analyzed: paricaraṇa kāle tesam pamādam ñatvā nāga rājā dve kesadhātuyaḥ gahetvā nāga bhavane ṭhapesi

original: Tvaṃ tā dhātuyo āharitvā rañño dehīti āṇāpesi. Thero taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā gato.
analyzed: tvam tāḥ dhātuyaḥ āharitvā raññaḥ dehi iti āṇāpesi thero tam vacanam sampaṭicchitvā gataḥ

original: Tato rājā attano bhaginiyā somadeviyā ca bhāgineyyassa giriabhayarañño ca sāsanaṃ
analyzed: tatas rājā attanaḥ bhaginiyā somadeviyā ca bhāgineyyassa giriabhaya rañño ca sāsanam

original: pesesi? Sve dhātunidhānaṃkarissāma. Tumhe senaṅgaṃ gahetvā āgacchathā’ti. Loṇanagare
analyzed: pesesi sve dhātu nidhānaṃkarissāma tumhe senaṅgam gahetvā āgacchatha ati loṇa nagare

original: mahānāgarañño ca seru nagare sivarañño ca tatheva sāsanaṃ pesetvā sayampi attano
analyzed: mahānāga rañño ca seru nagare siva rañño ca tathā iva sāsanam pesetvā sayam pi attano

original: vijite yena mayhaṃ hatthato antamaso ekakarīsamattampi laddhaṃ tadupādāya sabbepi
analyzed: vijite yena mayham hatthato antamasaḥ eka karīsa mattam pi laddham tat upādāya sabbe pi

original: tumhe saddhiṃ parivārena āgacchathā’ti bheriṃ carāpesi. Taṃ sutvā somanassappattā
analyzed: tumhe saddhim parivārena āgacchatha ati bherim tam sutvā somanassa pattā

original: mahājanā attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkatapaṭiyattā agamiṃsu. Rājā pabhātāya
analyzed: mahā janāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ vibhava anurūpena alaṅkata paṭiyattāḥ agamiṃsu rājā pabhātāya

original: rattiyā sabbe seniyo gandhamālādhūpadhajādayo gahetvā dhātunidhānaṃ āgacchantuti
analyzed: rattiyā sabbe seniyaḥ gandha mālā dhūpadhaja ādayaḥ gahetvā dhātu nidhānam āgacchantu iti

original: vatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tivīvaratthāya mahagghavatthādīni datvā sayampi
analyzed: vatvā bhikkhu saṅghassa mahā dānam da tvā tivīvara tthāya mahagghavattha ādīni da tvā sayam pi

original: sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍito nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya maṇikuṇḍalamekhalānūpura
analyzed: sabba alaṅkāra pati maṇḍitaḥ nānagga rasa bhojanam bhuñjitvā uposatham adhiṭṭhāya maṇi kuṇḍala mekhalā nūpura

original: valayādivicittasabbālaṅkāravibhūsitāhi koseyyādisukhumanānāvidhavicittavatthanivatthāhi
analyzed: valaya ādi vicitta sabba alaṅkāra vibhūsitāhi koseyya ādi sukhuma nānāvidha vicitta vattha nivatthāhi

original: naccagītavāditaturiyabhaṇḍagahita hatthāhi devaccharāpaṭibhāganāṭakitthīhi parivārito
analyzed: hatthāhi parivāritaḥ

original: vuttappakārehi saddhiṃ cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: vutta ppakārehi saddhim cetiya ṭṭhānam gantvā mahā bhikkhu saṅgham vanditvā aṭṭhāsi

original: Tato somanagare giriabhayarājā’pi sabbe nāgarā attano attano vibhavānurūpena dhātunidhānaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tatas somanagare giriabhaya rājā api sabbe nāgarāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ vibhava anurūpena dhātu nidhāna ṭhānam

original: āgacchantuti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍito susajjitaamaccagaṇaparivārito
analyzed: āgacchantu ti nagare bherim cara apetvā sayam sabba alaṅkāra pati maṇḍito su sajjita amacca gaṇa parivārito

original: nikkhami. Soma devīpi sīsaṃ nahātvā ahatavatthanivatthā sabbālaṅkārapatimaṇḍitā devaccharā
analyzed: nikkhami soma sīsam nahātvā ahata vattha nivatthā sabba alaṅkāra pati maṇḍitā deva charā

original: viya attano parivārā pañcasatakumāriyo nīlavatthehi paridahāpetvā tatheva alaṅkāretvā
analyzed: viya attano parivārā pañca sata kumāriyaḥ nīla vatthehi paridahāpetvā tathā iva alaṅkāretvā

original: puṇṇaghaṭe gāhāpetvā tāsaṃ anantarā pañcasatakumāriyo pītavatthehi paridahāpetvā
analyzed: puṇṇa ghaṭe gāhāpetvā tāsam anantarā pañca sata kumāriyaḥ pīta vatthehi paridahāpetvā

original: tatheva alaṅkāretvā pūjābhaṇḍāni gāhāpetvā, tāsaṃ anantarā pañcasata kumāriyo rattavatthehi
analyzed: tathā iva alaṅkāretvā pūjā bhaṇḍāni gāhāpetvā tāsam anantarā pañcasata kumāriyaḥ ratta vatthehi

original: paridahāpetvā tatheva. Alaṅkāretvā vicitrapupphapūritamañjusāyo gāhāpetvā tāsaṃ anantarā
analyzed: paridahāpetvā tathā iva alaṅkāretvā vicitra puppha pūrita mañju sāyaḥ gāhāpetvā tāsam anantarā

original: pañcasatakumāriyo setavatthehi paridahāpetvā tatheva alaṅkāretvā dhūma kaṭacchuke
analyzed: pañca sata kumāriyo seta vatthehi paridahāpetvā tathā iva alaṅkāretvā dhūma kaṭacchuke

original: gāhāpetvā evaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ saṃvidahitvā parivārena cetiṅgaṇaṃ gantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ
analyzed: gāhāpetvā evam pūjā vidhānam saṃvidahitvā parivārena cetiṅgaṇam gantvā mahā bhikkhu saṅgham

original: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā attano sāminā giriabhayarājena
analyzed: pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā gandha mālā ādīhi pūjam katvā sāminā giriabhayarājena

original: saddhiṃ ekapasse ṭhītā.
analyzed: saddhim eka passe

original: Loṇanagare mahānāgarājā’pi sabbālaṅkārehi patimaṇḍito sabbābharaṇehi susajjītaamaccamaṇḍalaparivuto
analyzed: loṇa nagare mahā nāga rājā api sabba alaṅkārehi pati maṇḍitaḥ sabba ābharaṇehi

original: naccagītaturīyāni paggaṇhāpayamāno gandhamālā dhūmakaṭacchu gāhāpetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: nacca gīta turīyāni paggaṇhāpayamānaḥ gandha mālāḥ dhūma kaṭacchu gāhāpetvā cetiya ṭṭhānam

original: āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: āgantvā bhikkhu saṅgham vanditvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Serunagare sivarājā’pi attānaṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā mahantena parivārena pūjāvidhānaṃ
analyzed: seru nagare siva rājā api attānam sabba alaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā mahantena parivārena pūjā vidhānam

original: gāhāpetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Rājaparisā
analyzed: gāhāpetvā cetiya ṭṭhānam āgantvā mahā bhikkhu saṅgham vanditvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi rāja parisā

original: attano vibhavānurūpena vatthālaṅkārehi candana mālādīhi ca sobhamānā nalāṭe muttākalāpamolambaka
analyzed: vibhava anurūpena vattha alaṅkārehi candana mālā ādīhi ca sobhamānā nalāṭe

original: vicittasuvaṇṇapaṭṭāni bandhitvā hatthābharaṇādi anekābharaṇehi dibbaparisā viya sumaṇḍitapasādhitā
analyzed: vicitta suvaṇṇa paṭṭāni bandhitvā hattha ābharaṇa ādi aneka ābharaṇehi dibba parisā viya su maṇḍita pasādhitā

original: vesānurūpāni vividhāvudhāni gahetvā ekapasse ṭhītā. Sīhavyagghadīpicammehi pasādhitasuvaṇṇālaṅkārasuvaṇṇadhajahemajālasañchanne
analyzed: vesa anurūpāni vividha avudhāni gahetvā eka passe sīha vyaggha dīpi cammehi pasādhita suvaṇṇa alaṅkāra suvaṇṇa dhaja hema jāla sañchanne

original: ratha vare ca sabbālaṅkāravibhusitā rathikā āruyha ekapasse ṭhītā. Brāhmaṇaputtādayo
analyzed: ratha vare ca sabba alaṅkāra vibhusitāḥ rathikāḥ āruyha eka passe ṭhītāḥ brāhmaṇa putta ādayo

original: maṇḍitacamme pārupitvā upasobhayamānā ekapasse ṭhītā. Bahu amaccā attano attano vesānurūpena
analyzed: maṇḍita camme upasobhayamānāḥ eka passe ṭhītāḥ bahu amaccāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ vesa anurūpena

original: mahagghavatthābharaṇavibhūsitā saparivārā ekapasse ṭhītā. Gandhodaka pūrita dakkhiṇāvatta
analyzed: mahaggha vattha ābharaṇa vibhūsitā sa parivārā gandha udaka pūrita dakkhiṇāvatta

original: saṅkhaṃ gahetvā upavītasuttaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā brāhmaṇaveṭhanaṃ veṭhetvā purohitabrāhmaṇā
analyzed: saṅkham gahetvā upavīta suttam eka aṃsam karitvā brāhmaṇa veṭhanam veṭhetvā purohita brāhmaṇā

original: mahantena parivārena pūjāvidhānaṃ gāhāpetvā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ
analyzed: mahantena parivārena pūjā vidhānam gāhāpetvā cetiya ṭṭhānam āgantvā mahā bhikkhu saṅgham

original: vanditvā jayaghosaṃ sāventā evamāhaṃsu?
analyzed: vanditvā jayaghosam sāventāḥ evam āhaṃsu

original: Khemaṃ subhikkhaṃ bhavatu niccaṃ janapadaṃ sivaṃ;
analyzed: khemam subhikkham bhavatu niccam janapadam sivam

original: Sassāni samuppajjantu rañño evaṃ jayā siyuṃ.
analyzed: sassāni samuppajjantu raññaḥ evam jayā siyum

original: Avasesā mahājanā evamāhaṃsu? Samuddapariyantaṃ hi mahiṃ sāgarakuṇḍalaṃ vasundharaṃ
analyzed: avasesāḥ mahājanāḥ evam āhaṃsu samudda pariyantam hi mahim sāgara kuṇḍalam vasundharam

original: āvasatu amaccaparivārito. Evaṃ vatvā? Amhākaṃ ayyo kākavaṇṇatisso mahā rājā sadevake

original: loke ekapuggalassa lokanāthassanalāṭadhātuṃ patiṭṭhāpetī’ti attano attano vibhavānurūpena
analyzed: loke eka puggalassa lokanāthassanalāṭa dhātum patiṭṭhāpeti iti attanaḥ attanaḥ vibhava anurūpena

original: sumaṇḍitapasādhitā. Khujjavāmanakādayo’pi sabbe janā pūjābhaṇḍāni gahetvā sādhukāraṃ
analyzed: sabbe janā pūjā bhaṇḍāni gahetvā sādhukāram

original: dadamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Imasmiṃ cetiyaṭṭhāne rāsībhūtā parisā evaṃ veditabbā? Khattiyā
analyzed: dadamānāḥ aṭṭhaṃsu imasmin cetiya ṭṭhāne rāsībhūtā parisā evam veditabbā khattiyā

original: brāhmaṇā vessā negamā ca samāgatā pupphādigahitā sabbe alaṅkāravibhūsitā.
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ vessāḥ negamā ca samāgatā puppha ādi gahitā sabbe alaṅkāra vibhūsitā

original: Gaṇanā vītivattā te aneke ca mahājanā;
analyzed: gaṇanā vītivattā te aneke ca mahājanā

original: Samuddo pattharantova khattiyā samupāgatā.
analyzed: samuddaḥ pattharantā iva khattiyā samupāgatā

original: Alaṅkato mahārājā sarājaparivārito;
analyzed: alaṅkataḥ mahā rājā sa rāja parivāritaḥ

original: Devarājā yathā sakko aṭṭhāsi cetiyaṅgaṇe.
analyzed: devarājā yathā sakkaḥ aṭṭhāsi cetiyaṅgaṇe

original: Sādhuvādena sattānaṃ pañcaṅgaturiyehi ca;
analyzed: sādhuvādena sattānam pañcaṅga turiyehi ca

original: Hatthassarathasaddena samākiṇṇaṃ mahītalaṃ.
analyzed: samākiṇṇam mahī talam

original: Tato cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero attano saddhivihārīke pañcasata khīṇāsave parivāretvā

original: cetiyaṭṭhānameva āgato. Mahāsāgalatthero’pi pañcasata khīṇāsave parivāretvā cetiyaṭṭhānameva

original: āgato. Mahindatthero’pi attano sāvake saṭṭhimatte khiṇāsave gahetvā cetiyaṭṭhānameva
analyzed: āgataḥ mahinda ttheraḥ api attano sāvake saṭṭhimatte khiṇāsave gahetvā cetiya ṭṭhānam eva

original: āgato. Iti iminā niyāmeneva eko dve tayo cattāro pañca khīṇāsavā āgacchantā satta
analyzed: āgataḥ iti iminā niyāmena iva ekaḥ dve tayo cattāro pañca khīṇāsavā āgacchantā satta

original: sahassamattā ahesuṃ. Tato cūḷapiṇḍapātiyatissatthero ettake bhikkhū parivāretvā cetiyaṅgaṇe
analyzed: sahassa mattāḥ ahesum tatas cūḷapiṇḍapātiya tissa theraḥ ettake bhikkhū parivāretvā cetiyaṅgaṇe

original: nisīdī. Tato rājā āgantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā therena saddhiṃ kathesi? Kesadhātu
analyzed: nisīdī tatas rājā āgantvā pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā therena saddhim kathesi kesadhātu

original: kuto labhissāma ayyā’ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tissatthero attano saddhivihārikaṃ sivattheraṃ
analyzed: kutas labhissāma ayyā iti tasmin khaṇe tissa theraḥ attanaḥ saddhivihārikam siva ttheraṃ

original: olokesi. So olokitakkhaṇeyeva nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ

original: vanditvā chaḷabhiñño mahākhīṇāsavo catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pathaviyaṃ

original: nimujjitvā bhumindharanāgavimāne pāturahosi.
analyzed: nimujjitvā bhumindhara nāga vimāne

original: (Sutvāssa sivathero ca vasippatto visārado;
analyzed: siva thero ca vasippatto visāradaḥ

original: Pākaṭo abhavi nāganagaraṃ purato khaṇe.)
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ abhavi nāga nagaram puratas khaṇe

original: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye jayaseno nāgarājā attano bhāgineyyaṃ dvikoṭimatte nāge parivāretvā
analyzed: tasmin khalu pana samaye jayasenaḥ nāga rājā attanaḥ bhāgineyyam dvi koṭi matte nāge parivāretvā

original: mahā yasaṃ anubhavamānaṃ nisinnaṃ iṅgitasaññaṃ datvā theraṃ duratova āgacchantaṃ
analyzed: mahā yasam anubhavamānam nisinnam iṅgita saññam da tvā theram āgacchantam

original: disvā cintesi? Imasmiṃ nāgabhavane samaṇehi kattabbakiccaṃ natthī. Nissaṃsayaṃ kesadhātuṃ
analyzed: disvā cintesi imasmin nāga bhavane samaṇehi kattabba kiccam natthi nissaṃsayam kesadhātum

original: kiñci ajānanto viya nisīdi. Tasmiṃ kāle thero tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Nāgarājā paccuggantvā
analyzed: kiñci a jānantaḥ viya nisīdi tasmin kāle thero tassa santikam agamāsi nāga rājā paccuggantvā

original: paṭisanthāraṃ karonto therena saddhiṃ kathesi. Kasmā ayyo āgato’ti vutte evamāha?
analyzed: paṭisanthāram karontaḥ therena saddhim kathesi kasmai ayyaḥ āgataḥ iti vutte evam āha

original: Tilokanāthassa amhākaṃ sambuddhassa kesadhātūnaṃ atthāya āgato, tuyhaṃ santike ṭhapitakesadhātuyo
analyzed: tilokanāthassa amhākam sambuddhassa kesa dhātūnaṃ atthāya āgataḥ tuyham santike ṭhapita kesa dhātuyaḥ

analyzed: papañcam a katvā mayham dehi sandhāya upajjhāyena pesitaḥ amhi iti vutte amhākam

original: sammā sambuddhassa kesadhātuyo mama santike natthī’ti āha. Thero dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ
analyzed: sammā sambuddhassa kesadhātuyaḥ mama santike natthi iti āha theraḥ dhātu karaṇḍakaṃ

original: gilitabhāvaṃ ñatvā gaṇhāmi mahārājā kesadhātuyo’ti vutte āma passanto gahetvā gacchāhīti

original: āha. Evaṃ tayo vāre paṭiññaṃ gahetvā tatheva ṭhīto?
analyzed: āha evam tayaḥ vāre paṭiññam gahetvā tathā iva

original: Iddhiyā māpayitvāna tato so sukhumaṃ karaṃ,
analyzed: id dhiyā māpayitvāna tatas saḥ su khumam karam

original: Pavesetvā mukhe tassa gaṇhī dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ;
analyzed: pavesetvā mukhe tassa dhātu karaṇḍakam

original: Nāgālayābhinikkhami tiṭṭha nāgā’ti bhāsiya.
analyzed: tiṭṭha nāga iti

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jayaseno nāgarājā samaṇaṃ vañcetvā pesitomhī’ti vatvā tassa gatakāle
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jayasenaḥ nāga rājā samaṇam vañcetvā pesitaḥ asmi iti vatvā tassa gata kāle

original: dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ oloketvā dhātu apassitvā samaṇena nāsitomhī’ti dve hatthe ukkhipitvā
analyzed: dhātu karaṇḍakam oloketvā dhātu a passitvā samaṇena na āsitaḥ asi iti dve hatthe ukkhipitvā

original: ṭhapetvā attano sakalanāgabhavanaṃ eka kolāhalaṃ katvā mahantena saddena paridevanto?
analyzed: ṭhapetvā attano sakala nāga bhavanam eka kolāhalam katvā mahantena saddena paridevantaḥ

original: Amhākaṃ cakkhuni uppāṭetvā gato viya sadevakassa lokassa patiṭṭhānabhūtassa sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: amhākam cakkhuni uppāṭetvā gataḥ viya sa devakassa lokassa patiṭṭhāna bhūtassa sammāsambuddhassa

original: kesadhātuyo apāyadukkhato amuñcantānaṃ amhākaṃ abhibhavitvā dhātuyo gahetvā gatasamaṇaṃ
analyzed: kesa dhātuyaḥ apāya dukkhataḥ a muñcantānam amhākam abhibhavitvā dhātuyaḥ gahetvā gata samaṇam

original: anubandhitvā gaṇhissāmā’ti dvekoṭimatte nāge gahetvā attano bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ
analyzed: anubandhitvā gaṇhissāma iti dvekoṭi matte nāge gahetvā attanaḥ bhāgineyyena saddhim

original: tassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhitvā ākāsaṃ uggacchiṃ (su). Tasmiṃ khaṇe pana sivatthero
analyzed: tassa piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ anubandhitvā ākāsam uggacchiṃ su tasmin khaṇe pana siva thero

original: akāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ pāvisi. Puna tepi pathaviyaṃ pavisiṃsu. Evaṃ thero tehi
analyzed: akāsataḥ otaritvā pathaviyam pāvisi puna te pi pathaviyam evam theraḥ tehi

original: saddhiṃ ummujja nimujjaṃ karonto pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā serunagarassa nātidūre piṭṭhipāsāṇe
analyzed: saddhim ummujja nimujjam karonto pāṭihāriyam dassetvā seru nagarassa na atidūre piṭṭhi pāsāṇe

original: uggañji. Tattheva te saṃvejetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe mahābhikkhusaṅghassa purato pākaṭo ahosi.
analyzed: uggañji tattha iva te saṃvejetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe mahā bhikkhu saṅghassa puratas pākaṭaḥ ahosi

original: Nāgā taṃ gahetuṃ asakkontā mahantena saddena ravaṃ patiravaṃ datvā. Ito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: nāgā tam gahetum a sakkontā mahantena saddena ravam patiravam da tvā itas paṭṭhāya

original: naṭṭhamhā’ti tasmiṃ piṭṭhi pāsāṇe sabbe samāgamaṃ katvā mahāsaddena parideviṃsu?
analyzed: naṭṭhamha iti tasmin piṭṭhi pāsāṇe sabbe samāgamam katvā mahā saddena parideviṃsu

original: Naṭṭhambhā vata bho’ti. Tato paṭṭhāya so piṭṭhipāsāṇo nāgānaṃ ravaṃ patiravaṃ datvā
analyzed: vata bhoti tatas paṭṭhāya so piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ nāgānam ravam pati ravam da tvā

original: paridevitahāvena nāgagallaṃ nāma ahosi.
analyzed: paridevita hāvena nāgagallam nāma ahosi

original: Nāgo therassa piṭṭhitoyeva anubandhitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ evamāha? Deva,
analyzed: nāgaḥ therassa anubandhitvā cetiya ṅgaṇam gantvā rājānam evam āha deva

original: eso bhikkhu mayā adinnadhātu gahetvā āgato’ti. Taṃ sutvā rājā? Saccaṃ kira ayya nāgassa
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhu mayā adinna dhātu gahetvā āgataḥ ti tam sutvā rājā saccam kira ayya nāgassa

original: vacananti vutte naheva mahārāja, iminā dinnaṃ eva dhātuṃ aggahesinti vutte? Nāgo
analyzed: vacanam iti vutte nahā iva mahā rāja iminā dinnam eva dhātum aggahesin ti vutte nāgaḥ

original: tava sakkhiṃ dehīti āha. Thero tassa bhāginyeṃ samaṇuppala nāgarājānaṃ sakkhiṃ akāsi.
analyzed: tava sakkhim dehi iti āha theraḥ tassa samaṇuppala nāga rājānam sakkhim akāsi

original: Rājā tassa bhāgineyyassa sabbavacanaṃ sutvā saddahi. Tasmiṃ kāle dukkhābhibhūto nāgarājā
analyzed: rājā tassa bhāgineyyassa sabba vacanam sutvā saddahi tasmin kāle dukkha abhibhūtaḥ nāga rājā

original: gantvā bahi ṭhīto. Tato paṭṭhāya so nāgarājā bahi hutvā nisinnattā bahināgarājā nāma
analyzed: gantvā bahi tatas paṭṭhāya so nāga rājā bahi hutvā nisinnattā bahināgarājā nāma

original: ahosi. Tassa pana bhāgineyyaṃ anto cetiyaṅgaṇe nisīdāpesi. Imassa pana cetiyassa
analyzed: ahosi tassa pana bhāgineyyam anto cetiyaṅgaṇe nisīdāpesi imassa pana cetiyassa

original: ārakkhaṃ gahitanāgā kathetabbā. Sumananāgarañño parivārā chakoṭimattā nāgā, jayasenassa
analyzed: ārakkham gahita nāgā kathetabbā sumana nāga rañño parivārāḥ cha koṭi mattāḥ nāgāḥ jayasenassa

original: parivārā koṭisatamattā nāgā, samaṇuppalanāgarañño parivārā dvikoṭimattā nāgā ahesuṃ.
analyzed: parivārā koṭi sata mattā nāgā samaṇuppala nāga rañño parivārā dvi koṭi mattāḥ nāgāḥ ahesuṃ

original: Sabbe dhātuyā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Rājā therassa hatthato kesadhātuṃ gahetvā ratanacaṅegāṭake
analyzed: sabbe dhātuyāḥ ārakkham gaṇhiṃsu rājā therassa hatthato kesadhātum gahetvā ratana caṅegāṭake

original: ṭhapetvā mahindassa nāma amaccassa adāsi. Tasmiṃ samāgame tipiṭakamahāphussadevattherassa
analyzed: ṭhapetvā mahindassa nāma amaccassa adāsi tasmin samāgame tipiṭaka mahāphussa deva ttherassa

original: saddhivihārikā paṭisambhidappattā cattāro sāmaṇerā ahesuṃ. Tesu eko malaya rājaputto
analyzed: saddhivihārikā paṭisambhida pattā cattāraḥ sāmaṇerāḥ ahesum tesu ekaḥ malaya rāja putto

original: sumanasāmaṇero nāma, eko serunagare sivarājabhāgineyyassa putto uttara sāmaṇero nāma.
analyzed: sumana sāmaṇeraḥ nāma ekaḥ seru nagare siva rāja bhāgineyyassa putto uttara sāmaṇeraḥ nāma

original: Eko mahāgāme mālākāraputto cunda sāmaṇero nāma eko mahāgāme ekassa kuṭumbikassa putto
analyzed: ekaḥ mahāgāme mālākāra putto cunda sāmaṇeraḥ nāma ekaḥ mahāgāme ekassa kuṭumbikassa putto

original: mahākassapasāmaṇero nāma, ime cattāro sāmaṇerā ajja kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā mahācetiye
analyzed: mahākassapa sāmaṇeraḥ nāma ime cattāraḥ sāmaṇerāḥ ajja kākavaṇṇa tissa mahā rājā mahā cetiye

original: dhātu nidhānaṃ karissati, mayaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā sukusumāni āharissāmāti theraṃ
analyzed: dhātu nidhānam karissati mayam himavantam gantvā su kusumāni āharissāma ati theram

original: vanditvā ākāsato himavantaṃ gantvā campakanāgasalalādayo pūjanīyamālaṃ gahetvā tāvatiṃsadeva lokaṃ gatā.
analyzed: vanditvā ākāsataḥ himavantam gantvā campaka nāga salala ādayaḥ pūjanīya mālam gahetvā lokam gatā

original: Tasmiṃ kāle sakko devarājā sabbābharaṇapatimaṇḍito dvisu devalokesu devatāyo gahetvā
analyzed: tasmin kāle sakkaḥ devarājā sabba ābharaṇa pati maṇḍitaḥ dvisu deva lokesu devatā ayaḥ gahetvā

original: erāvaṇahatthīkkhandhamāruyha aḍḍhateyyakoṭidevaccharāparivārito sudassanamahā vīthiyaṃ
analyzed: erāvaṇa hatthī kkhandham āruyha aḍḍhateyya koṭi deva charā parivāritaḥ sudassana mahā vīthiyaṃ

original: vicaranto savaṅgoṭake te cattāro sāmaṇere duratova āgacchante disvā hatthīkkhandhato
analyzed: vicarantaḥ sa vaṅgoṭake te cattāro sāmaṇere āgacchante disvā hatthī kkhandhato

original: oruyha pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā tesaṃ hatthe mālācaṅgoṭake disvā? Kiṃ ayyā tumhākaṃ
analyzed: oruyha pañca patiṭṭhitena vanditvā tesam hatthe mālā caṅgoṭake disvā kim ayyā tumhākam

original: hatthe’ti pucchi. Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇerā mahārāja, kiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi. Laṅkāyaṃ kākavaṇṇatissa
analyzed: hattha iti pucchi tam sutvā sāmaṇerāḥ mahā rāja kim tvam na jānāsi laṅkāyam kāka vaṇṇatissa

original: mahārājā dasabalassa nalāṭadhātuṃ gahetvā mahāvālukagaṅagāya dakkhiṇapasse seru nāma
analyzed: mahā rājā dasabalassa nalāṭa dhātum gahetvā mahāvāluka gaṅagāya dakkhiṇa passe seru nāma

original: dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake cetiyaṃ kārāpetuṃ tumhākaṃ niyogena vissakammadevaputtena
analyzed: dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake cetiyam kārāpetum tumhākam niyogena vissakammadevaputtena

original: nimmitैṭṭhakāni gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā ajja dhātunidhānaṃ karoti. Tattha pūjanatthāya
analyzed: nimmitṭṭhakāni gahetvā cetiyam kārāpetvā ajja dhātu nidhānam karoti tattha pūjana tthāya

original: himavantato ānītapupphamidanti vatvā itopi kusumaṃ gahetuṃ āgatamhā’ti vadiṃsu. Sakko
analyzed: himavantataḥ ānīta puppham idam ti vatvā itas pi kusumam gahetum āgatamha iti vadiṃsu sakko

original: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā?
analyzed: tesam vacanam sutvā

original: Ayya tumhākaṃ hatthe pupphāni cūḷāmaṇicetiye pujetvā amhākaṃ uyyānato pupphāni gahetvā
analyzed: ayya tumhākam hatthe pupphāni cūḷāmaṇi cetiye pujetvā amhākam uyyānataḥ pupphāni gahetvā

original: gacchathāti vatvā tehi saddhiṃ gantvā tesaṃ pupphehi cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ pūjesi. Tato
analyzed: gacchatha iti vatvā tehi saddhim gantvā tesam pupphehi cūḷāmaṇi cetiyam pūjesi tatas

original: papañcaṃ na bhavitabbanti sakkassa nivedesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā sakko sāmaṇerānaṃ pañcamahāuyyānato
analyzed: na bhavitabbanti sakkassa nivedesuṃ tam sutvā sakkaḥ sāmaṇerānam pañca mahā uyyānataḥ

original: pāricchatta-koviḷārādīni pupphāni ca candanacuṇṇañca gahetvā dāpesi. Sāmaṇerā pupphāni
analyzed: pāricchatta koviḷāra ādīni pupphāni ca candana cuṇṇam ca gahetvā dāpesi sāmaṇerā pupphāni

original: gahetvā devalokato otaritvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇamaṇipabbate santacchāyāya
analyzed: gahetvā deva lokataḥ otaritvā himavantam pavisitvā suvaṇṇamaṇi pabbate santa chāyāya

original: nasīditvā divāvihāraṃ katvā nakkhattavelāya sampattāya maṇī gavesamānā cattāro maṇayo
analyzed: na sīditvā divāvihāram katvā nakkhatta velāya sampattāya maṇī gavesamānā cattāro maṇayo

original: addasaṃsu. Tesaṃ eko indanīlamaṇī, eko pahassarajotiraṅga maṇī, eko veluriyamaṇi,
analyzed: tesam ekaḥ inda nīla maṇī ekaḥ maṇī ekaḥ veluriya maṇi

original: eko masāragallamaṇi, cattāro maṇayo ca dibbapupphāni ca gahetvā therānaṃ dassesuṃ.
analyzed: ekaḥ masāragalla maṇi cattāraḥ maṇayaḥ ca dibba pupphāni ca gahetvā therānam dassesuṃ

original: Thero? Mahārāja, ime sāmaṇerā pāricchattakakoviḷārādīni pupphāni ca candanacuṇṇañca
analyzed: theraḥ mahā rāja ime sāmaṇerā pāricchattaka koviḷāra ādīni pupphāni ca candana cuṇṇam ca

original: cattāro maṇayo ca gahetvā āgatā’ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
analyzed: cattāro maṇayaḥ ca gahetvā āgatā ati raññaḥ ārocesuṃ

original: Rājā taṃ sutvā somanassajāto sāmaṇere pañca patiṭṭhītena vanditvā tesamāhatamaṇayo
analyzed: rājā tam sutvā somanassa jātaḥ sāmaṇere pañca patiṭṭhītena vanditvā

original: gahetvā mahānanda nāma amaccassa datvā therehī saddhiṃ mahantena parivārena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā mahānanda nāma amaccassa da tvā therehī saddhim mahantena parivārena cetiyaṅgaṇam

original: gantvā maṇikaraṇḍakena dhātuṃ gahetvā attano sīse dhātuṃ ṭhapetvā upari setacchattaṃ
analyzed: gantvā maṇi karaṇḍakena dhātum gahetvā sīse dhātum ṭhapetvā upari

original: kārāpetvā cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pācīnadvāre ṭhīto? Ayaṃ dasabalassa
analyzed: kārāpetvā cetiyam tikkhattum padakkhiṇam katvā pācīna dvāre ayam dasabalassa

original: nalāṭadhātu amhehi kārāpitāya buddhapaṭimāya nalāṭe uṇṇalomākāraṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahatūti
analyzed: nalāṭa dhātu amhehi kārāpitāya buddha paṭimāya nalāṭe uṇṇa loma ākāram hutvā patiṭṭhahatu iti

original: adhiṭṭhāsi. Tassa cintitakkhaṇeyeva dhātu karaṇḍato nabhamuggantvā ākāse sattatālappamāṇe
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāsi tassa cintita kkhaṇeya iva dhātu karaṇḍataḥ nabham uggantvā ākāse satta tāla ppamāṇe

original: ṭhatvā chabbaṇṇa raṃsiyo vissajjesi. Tā raṃsiyo kuṭena āsiñcamānavilīna suvaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: ṭhatvā chabbaṇṇa raṃsiyaḥ vissajjesi suvaṇṇam

original: viya antalikkhato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ raṃsijālehi ekobhāsaṃ
analyzed: viya antalikkhataḥ nikkhanta suvaṇṇa rasa dhārā viya sakala laṅkā dīpam raṃsi jālehi

original: katvā gaṇhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kāle yamakapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi. Mahākāruṇikassa
analyzed: katvā gaṇhiṃsu tasmin kāle yamaka pāṭihāriya sadisam pāṭihāriyam ahosi mahā kāruṇikassa

original: bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājanā tathāgatassa rūpakāyaṃ paccakkhabhutā viya ahesuṃ.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ a diṭṭha pubbam pāṭihāriyam disvā mahājanāḥ tathāgatassa rūpa kāyam paccakkha bhutāḥ viya ahesuṃ

original: Adiṭṭhapubbaṃ satthussa pāṭihīraṃ mahājanā;
analyzed: a diṭṭha pubbam satthussa pāṭihīram mahājanāḥ

original: Disvā pītiparā jātā pasādamajjhaguṃ jine.
analyzed: disvā pīti parā jātā pasāda majjhagum jine

original: Pūjesuṃ gandhamālañca alaṅkāraṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ;
analyzed: gandha mālam ca alaṅkāram sakam sakam

original: Sabbe vandiṃsu sirasā-cetiyaṃ īdisaṃ varaṃ.
analyzed: sabbe vandiṃsu sirasācetiyam īdisam varam

original: Tasmiṃ samāgame eko paṇḍitapuriso jinaṃ thomento evamāha?
analyzed: tasmin samāgame ekaḥ paṇḍita purisaḥ jinam evam āha

original: Nibbutassāpi buddhassa yaso bhavati īdiso;
analyzed: nibbutassa api buddhassa yasaḥ bhavati īdiso

original: Ṭhītassa lokanāthassa kīdisā āsi sampadā.
analyzed: ṭhītassa lokanāthassa kīdisā āsi sampadā

original: Anubhāvamidaṃ sabbaṃ puññeneva mahesino;
analyzed: anubhāvam idam sabbam puññena iva mahesinaḥ

original: Kareyya ñatvā puññaṃ taṃ patthento bodhimuttamaṃ.
analyzed: kareyya ñatvā puññam tam patthentaḥ bodhim uttamam

original: Tasmiṃ kāle nānāratanavicittaṃ anekālaṅkārapatimaṇḍitaṃ mahārahaṃ samussitadhajapatākaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kāle nānā ratana vicittam aneka alaṅkāra patimaṇḍitam mahā raham samussita dhaja patākam

original: nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇaṃ anekapūjāvidhānaṃ gahetvā manussā chaṇavesaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
analyzed: nānāvidha kusuma samākiṇṇam aneka pūjā vidhānam gahetvā manussāḥ chaṇa vesam gaṇhiṃsu

original: Anekavidhaturiyasaṅghuṭṭaṃ ahosi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe devatāyo pupphavassaṃ vassāpenti.
analyzed: anekavidha turiya saṅghuṭṭam ahosi tasmin khaṇe devatāyo puppha vassam vassāpenti

original: Mahānubhāvasampannā nāgā pūjaṃ karonti. Evaṃ sabbe devā nāgā manussā sādhukāraṃ denti,
analyzed: mahā anubhāva sampannā nāgā pūjam karonti evam sabbe devā nāgā manussā sādhukāram denti

original: apphoṭenti, velukkhepaṃ karonti, hatthīno kuñcanādaṃ nadanti. Assā tuṭṭhiravaṃ ravanti,
analyzed: apphoṭenti velu khepam karonti hatthīnaḥ kuñca nādam nadanti assā tuṭṭhi ravam ravanti

original: bahalaghana mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantaṃ kampi. Disāsu vijjullatā nicchariṃsu.
analyzed: bahala ghana mahā pathavī yāvaḥ udaka pariyantam kampi disāsu

original: Sakalalaṅkādīpe sumanakūṭādayo mahānagā kusumagaṇasamākiṇṇā ahesuṃ. Sabbe jalāsayā
analyzed: sakala laṅkā dīpe sumanakūṭa ādayaḥ kusuma gaṇa samākiṇṇāḥ ahesum sabbe jalāsayā

original: pañcavidha padumasañchantā, devatānamantare manussā, manussānaṃ antare yakkhanāgasupaṇṇādayo
analyzed: devatānam antare manussāḥ manussānam antare yakkha nāga supaṇṇa ādayaḥ

original: ca ahesuṃ. Bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsaka upāsikā aparimāṇā ahesuṃ. Mahantena sādhukārena
analyzed: ca ahesum bhikkhu bhikkhunī upāsaka upāsikā aparimāṇāḥ ahesum mahantena sādhukārena

original: mahā nigghosena sakalalaṅkādīpe tibbavātābhihatasamuddo viya ekaninnādaṃ ekanigghosaṃ
analyzed: mahā nigghosena sakala laṅkā dīpe tibba vāta abhihata samuddaḥ viya eka ninnādam eka nigghosam

original: ahosi. Iminā pūjāvidhānena pasādakabhūtamahājanakāyamajjhe dhātu pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: iminā pūjā vidhānena pasādaka bhūta mahā jana kāya majjhe dhātu pāṭihāriyam dassetvā

original: ākāsato otaritvā buddhapaṭimāya nalāṭe puṇṇacandasassirīkaṃ abhibhavantamiva virocamānā patiṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: ākāsataḥ otaritvā buddha paṭimāya nalāṭe puṇṇa canda saḥ sirīkam abhibhavantam iva virocamānā patiṭṭhāsi

original: Rājā mahānandanāmakassa amaccassa hatthato kesadhātuṃ gahetvā vihāradeviyā datvā
analyzed: rājā mahānanda nāmakassa amaccassa hatthato kesadhātum gahetvā vihāradeviyā da tvā

original: tvaṃ imā kesadhātuyo dasabalassa anavalokita matthake patiṭṭhāpehī’ti āha. Sā kesadhātuyo
analyzed: tvam imā kesadhātuyaḥ dasabalassa anavalokita matthake patiṭṭhāpehi iti āha sā kesadhātuyaḥ

original: gahetvā tattheva patiṭṭhahantu’ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ akāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kesadhātuyo karaṇḍato
analyzed: gahetvā tattha iva patiṭṭhahantu ti adhiṭṭhānam akāsi tasmin khaṇe kesadhātuyaḥ karaṇḍato

original: nabhaṃ uggantvā mayūragīvasaṃkāsanīlaraṃsiyo vissajjentī ākāsato otaritvā buddhapaṭimāya
