original: Sārade nabhamajjhamhi ṭhito ruciraraṃsiyā.
analyzed: sārade nabha majjhamhi ṭhitaḥ rucira raṃsiyā

original: Tathā ayaṃ thūpavaro suppabhāso alaṅkato;
analyzed: tathā ayam thūpa varaḥ su pabhāsaḥ alaṅkataḥ

original: Mālāpadīpamajjhamhi bhāti bhutilakuttamo.
analyzed: mālāpa dīpa majjhamhi bhāti

original: Sabbe’pi pādapā assa laṅkādīpassa sabbaso;
analyzed: sabbe api pādapāḥ assa laṅkā dīpassa sabbaso

original: Dhajehi’va samākiṇṇā āsuṃ pupphaphalandadā.
analyzed: dhajehi iva samākiṇṇāḥ āsum puppha phalandadā

original: Sacetanā yathā sabbe akā pūjaṃ akā tadā;
analyzed: sa cetanāḥ yathā sabbe akāḥ pūjam tadā

original: Tathā acetanā sabbe akā pūjaṃ anappakaṃ.
analyzed: tathā acetanā sabbe akā pūjam anappakam

original: Yebhuyyena bhumaṭṭhe deve upādāya yāva akaṇiṭṭhakā devā brahmā dibbamālāpāricchattakakoviḷāracandanacuṇṇaṃ
analyzed: yebhuyyena bhumaṭṭhe deve upādāya yāva akaṇiṭṭhakāḥ devāḥ brahmā dibba mālā pāricchattaka koviḷāra candana cuṇṇam

original: gahetvā āgatādevāti vā manussāti vā jānituṃ asakkonti. Ukkaṭṭhamahāsamāgamo ahosi.
analyzed: gahetvā āgatā devā ati vā manussā ati vā jānitum asakkonti ukkaṭṭha mahā samāgamaḥ ahosi

original: Tasmimpi divase mahāpathavi ākāsayugandharacakkavāḷapabbatuttamādayo kampiṃsu. Taṃ
analyzed: tasmim pi divase mahā pathavi ākāsa yugandhara cakkavāḷa pabbata uttama ādayaḥ kampiṃsu tam

original: disvā rājā ativiya somanassappatto there ca avasesa mahāmattādayo sannipātetvā nāṭakādayo
analyzed: disvā rājā ativiya somanassappatto there ca avasesa mahāmatta ādayo sannipātetvā nāṭaka ādayo

original: ca gahetvā, idānevāhaṃ vihāradakkhiṇaṃ dassāmi’ti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ agamāsi. Theropi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
analyzed: ca gahetvā idānā iva aham vihāra dakkhiṇam dassāmi iti cetiya ṅgaṇam agamāsi theraḥ api bhikkhu saṅghaṃ

original: gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe alaṅkatamaṇḍape nisīdi. Rājā vāsitagandhodakasuvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ
analyzed: gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇe alaṅkata maṇḍape nisīdi rājā vāsita gandha udaka suvaṇṇa bhiṅkāram

original: gahetvā udakaṃ therassa hatthe āsiñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ adāsi. Datvā ca pana evamāha;
analyzed: gahetvā udakam therassa hatthe āsiñcitvā dakkhiṇam adāsi da tvā ca pana evam āha

original: ayyā esā dhātu mayhaṃ pitāmahavaṃsena āgatā. Idāni amhākaṃ atiruciraramaṇiyā rohaṇajanapadā
analyzed: ayyā esā pitāmaha vaṃsena āgatā idāni amhākam ati rucira ramaṇiyā rohaṇa janapadā

original: āharitvā suvaṇṇena dhātugabbhaṃ, sattaratanena dhātumaṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā tasmiṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ
analyzed: āharitvā suvaṇṇena dhātu gabbham satta ratanena dhātu maṇḍapam kārāpetvā tasmin suvaṇṇa mayam

original: buddhapaṭimaṃ nisīdāpetvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa nalāṭadhātuṃ nidahitvā ayyassa cīvarādīnamatthāya
analyzed: buddha paṭimam nisīdāpetvā amhākam dasabalassa nalāṭa dhātum nidahitvā ayyassa

original: idāni soḷasagāmavarāni dassāmi’ti gāmavarāni datvā samantato tigāvutappamāṇe serudahe
analyzed: idāni soḷasa gāma varāni dassāmiti gāma varāni da tvā samantataḥ seru dahe

original: bheriṃ carāpetvā ārāmikaṃ katvā āha? Bhante, tumhākaṃ mayā dinnasoḷasagāmaṃ ajjeva
analyzed: bherim cara apetvā ārāmikam katvā āha bhante tumhākam mayā dinna soḷasa gāmam ajja iva

original: gantabbaṃ. Gantvā ca pana ajjeva pariggahaṃ karothāti vatvā tattheva vāsupagato puna
analyzed: gantabbam gantvā ca pana ajjā iva pariggaham karotha ati vatvā tattha iva vā a supagataḥ puna

original: divase samāgantvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase mahābhikkhusaṅghassa tīcīvarappahonakasāṭakaṃ
analyzed: divase samāgantvā sattāham mahādānam da tvā sattame divase mahā bhikkhu saṅghassa tīcīvara ppahonaka sāṭakam

original: paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ datvā therassa santikaṃ āgato, ayya vihāre kattabbaṃ aparihāpetvā
analyzed: paṇītam bhojanam datvā therassa santikam āgataḥ ayya vihāre kattabbam a parihāpetvā

original: mayā kataṃ, gehaṃ gamissāmīti (nivedesi). Thero tassa kathaṃ sutvā sādhu mahārājāti sampaṭicchi.
analyzed: mayā katam geham gamissāmi iti nivedesi thero tassa katham sutvā sādhu mahā rājā ati sampaṭicchi

original: So pana cetiyassa pūjanatthāya pupphārāmaṃ kārāpetvā mālākārānaṃ paribbayaṃ dāpesi.
analyzed: saḥ pana cetiyassa pūjana thāya puppha ārāmam kārāpetvā mālākārānam paribbayam dāpesi

original: Tathā bherivādakanāṭakānampi vihārasīmante suvaṇṇanaṅgalena paricchinditvā ārāmikānampi
analyzed: tathā bheri vādaka nāṭakānam pi vihāra sīmante suvaṇṇa naṅgalena paricchinditvā ārāmikānam pi

original: gāmaṃ kārāpesi. Bhikkhusaṅghassa veyyāvaccatthāya attano santike pañcasataamaccadhītaro
analyzed: gāmam kārāpesi bhikkhu saṅghassa veyyāvacca atthāya attano santike

original: tattake amaccaputte dāsadāsiyo ca datvā paribbayatthāya tesaṃ tesaṃ pañcasatasahassakahāpaṇe
analyzed: tattake amacca putte dāsa dāsiyo ca da tvā paribbaya tthāya tesam tesam pañca sata sahassa kahāpaṇe

original: ca dāpesi. Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca dhātupujanatthāya soḷasasahassaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dāpesi.
analyzed: ca dāpesi bhikkhu saṅghassa ca dhātu pujana tthāya soḷasa sahassam kahāpaṇam dāpesi

original: Tato giriabhayaṃ pakkosāpetvā, tāta tumhe idheva niccaṃ vasatha. Amhākaṃ vihāre ca
analyzed: tatas giriabhayam tāta tumhe idhā iva niccam vasatha amhākam vihāre ca

original: ārāmikesu ca ayyesu ca appamatto hohīti ovaditvā sabbaṃ tassa niyyādesi. Thero tassa
analyzed: ārāmikesu ca ayyesu ca appamattaḥ hohi iti ovaditvā sabbam tassa niyyādesi theraḥ tassa

original: evamāha? Mahārāja samantato mahāsīmaṃ bandhitabbanti. Bandhatha bhanteti vutte? Mahārāja
analyzed: evam āha mahā rāja samantataḥ mahā sīmam bandhitabbanti bandhatha bhante ti vutte mahā rāja

original: akittitena nimittena sīmaṃ bandhituṃ nasakkā, vihārassa pācīna pacchimuttaradakkhiṇato
analyzed: a kittitena nimittena sīmam bandhitum na sakkā vihārassa

original: mahāsīmaṃ bandhanāya nimittaṃ sallakkhetvā dehi, mayaṃ sīmaṃ bandhissāmāti āha. Rājā
analyzed: mahā sīmam bandhanāya nimittam sallakkhetvā dehi mayam sīmam bandhissāma ati āha rājā

original: tuṭṭho satta amacce sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā sīmānimittaṃ kittetvā āgamanatthaṃ
analyzed: tuṭṭhaḥ satta amacce sabba alaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā sīmā nimittam kittetvā āgamana attham

original: pesesi. Te pana satta amaccā catusu disāsu nimittaṃ sallakkhetvā paṇṇe likhitvā āharitvā
analyzed: pesesi te pana satta amaccā catusu disāsu nimittam sallakkhetvā paṇṇe likhitvā āharitvā

original: rañño adaṃsu. Rājā ekekaṃ satakahāpaṇaṃ datvā catusu disāsu ārakkhaṃ dāpetvā sīmaṃ
analyzed: raññaḥ adaṃsu rājā ekekam sata kahāpaṇam datvā catusu disāsu ārakkham dāpetvā sīmaṃ

original: bandhantūti mahābhikkhusaṅghassa nivedesi. Atha thero bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cetiyaṅgaṇe
analyzed: bandhantu uti mahā bhikkhu saṅghassa nivedesi atha theraḥ bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ cetiyaṅgaṇe

original: nisīditvā vappamāsakāḷapakkhadvādasadivase sīmaṃ bandhitvā niṭṭhapesi.
analyzed: nisīditvā vappa māsa kāḷa pakkha dvādasa divase sīmam bandhitvā niṭṭhapesi

original: Tattha sīmānimittaṃ evaṃ jānitabbaṃ; purimāya disāya sigāla pāsāṇaṃ gato. Tato macchaselagāmassa
analyzed: tattha sīmā nimittam evam jānitabbam purimāya disāya sigāla pāsāṇam gataḥ tatas macchasela gāmassa

original: vāma passena koṭasīmā nāma gāmakkhettaṃ vissajjetvā gaṇadvāragāmaṃ gato. Cittavāpiyā
analyzed: passena koṭasīmā nāma gāma khettam vissajjetvā gaṇadvāra gāmam gataḥ citta vāpiyā

original: uttaravāna koṭito varagāmakkhette piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ gato. Tato sālikaṃ nāma madhukarukkhe
analyzed: koṭitaḥ varagāma khette piṭṭhi pāsāṇam gataḥ tato sālikam nāma madhuka rukkhe

original: ṭhītapāsāṇathūpassa gato. Tato vuttika nāma vāpiyā dakkhiṇavāna koṭito kaṇikāra selassa
analyzed: ṭhīta pāsāṇa thūpassa gataḥ tatas vuttika nāma vāpiyā koṭitaḥ kaṇikāra selassa

original: gato. Tato channajjhāpitaselassa gato. Tato kukkuṭasiva nāma upāsakassa madhukarukkhe
analyzed: gataḥ tatas channajjhāpitaselassa gataḥ tatas nāma upāsakassa madhuka rukkhe

original: ṭhītaṃ thūpaṃ gato. Tato soṇḍaṃ nāma selaṃ gato. Tato sabaraṃ nāma pāsāṇaṃ gato.
analyzed: ṭhītam thūpam gataḥ tatas soṇḍam nāma selam gataḥ tatas sabaram nāma pāsāṇam gataḥ

original: Tato elālatitthassa gato. Tato sobbha majjhimena gantvā assabandhanaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tatas elāla titthassa gataḥ tatas sobbha majjhimena gantvā assabandhanam nāma ṭhānaṃ

original: gato. Tato pāsāṇassa matthake udaka kākaṃ nāma nigrodhaṃ gato. So rukkho udaka kākānaṃ
analyzed: gataḥ tatas pāsāṇassa matthake udaka kākam nāma nigrodham gataḥ saḥ rukkhaḥ udaka kākānam

original: vusita bhāvena evaṃ nāma jāto. Tato tambatitthaṃ nāma gantā mahācārikassanāma thūpamaggassa
analyzed: vusita bhāvena evam nāma jātaḥ tatas tambatittham nāma gantā mahācārikassa nāma thūpa maggassa

original: gato. Tato assamaṇḍalapiṭṭhiṃ gato. Tato mahā kadamba passe ṭhītaṃ pāsāṇathūpaṃ gato.
analyzed: gataḥ tatas assa maṇḍala piṭṭhim gataḥ tatas mahā kadamba passe ṭhītam pāsāṇa thūpam gataḥ

original: Tato mahā rājuvāpiyā uttarakoṭiyā ṭhītaṃ mahānigrodharukkhaṃ gato. Tato mahāvanapiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: tatas mahā rāju vāpiyā uttara koṭiyā ṭhītam mahā nigrodha rukkham gataḥ tatas mahā vana piṭṭhim

original: gato. Tato loṇasāgarassa ante rajataselaṃ gato. Puna āvattitvā sigāla pāsāṇeyeva
analyzed: gataḥ tatas loṇa sāgarassa ante rajata selam gataḥ punar āvattitvā sigāla

original: ṭhīto. Imaṃ ettakaṃ padesaṃ samantato paricchindāpetvā rājā adāsi. Vihārassa bahū
analyzed: imam ettakam padesam samantataḥ rājā adāsi vihārassa

original: ārāmike ca (tesaṃ) vividhāni upakaraṇāni (ca) dāpetvā sabbe pākāratoraṇādayo kārāpetvā
analyzed: ārāmike ca tesam vividhāni upakaraṇāni ca dāpetvā sabbe pākāra toraṇa ādayaḥ kārāpetvā

original: vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpetvā rohaṇameva gato.
analyzed: vihāram niṭṭhāpetvā rohaṇam eva gataḥ

original: Rājā pasannahadayo mahāpuñño mahābalo;
analyzed: rājā pasanna hadayaḥ mahā puññaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: Kāretvā uttamaṃ thūpaṃ kañcanagghīka sobhitaṃ.
analyzed: kāretvā uttamam thūpam kañcanagghīka sobhitam

original: Bandhāpetvā tato sīmaṃ vaṭṭagāmañca soḷasa;
analyzed: sīmam vaṭṭa gāmam ca soḷasa

original: Datvā ārāmikānañca sabbupakaraṇāni ca.
analyzed: da tvā sabba upakaraṇāni ca

original: Tato so rohaṇaṃ gantvā mahāsenāpurakkhato;
analyzed: tatas saḥ rohaṇam gantvā mahā senā purakkhataḥ

original: Vihāradeviyā saddhiṃ modamāno vasī tahiṃ.
analyzed: vihāradeviyā saddhim modamānaḥ vasī tahim

original: Thero pana tattheva viharanto yo imasmiṃ vihāre vasanto tathāgatassa ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ
analyzed: thero pana tattha iva viharantaḥ yaḥ imasmin vihāre vasanto tathāgatassa eka gandha kuṭiyam

original: vuttho viya bhavissatīti khyākaritvā tato paṭṭhāya sīlācārasamādhisamāpattipaṭiladdhajaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidappattehi
analyzed: vutthaḥ viya bhavissati iti khyā karitvā tatas paṭṭhāya sīla ācāra samādhi samāpatti paṭiladdha jaḷa bhiññā paṭisambhida pattehi

original: khīṇāsavehi parivāretvā sabba buddhaguṇaṃ anussaranto ciraṃ vasitvā tattheva anupādisesāya
analyzed: khīṇāsavehi parivāretvā sabba buddha guṇam anussarantaḥ ciram vasitvā tattha iva an upādisesāya

original: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
analyzed: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi

original: Anekaguṇasampanno tissatthero bahussuto;
analyzed: aneka guṇa sampannaḥ tissa theraḥ bahu sutaḥ

original: Janānaṃ saṅgahaṃkatvā nibbuto so anāsavo.
analyzed: janānam saṅgahaṃkatvā nibbutaḥ saḥ anāsavaḥ

original: Therāpi te sīlasamādhiyuttā,
analyzed: therā api te sīla samādhi yuttā

original: Bahussutā sādhuguṇābhirāmā;
analyzed: bahu ssutā sādhu guṇa abhirāmā

original: Paññāpabhāvāyuppannacittā,
analyzed: paññā pabhāva āyuppanna cittā

original: Guṇākarā tānayutā janānaṃ.
analyzed: guṇa ākarā tāna yutā janānam

original: Pahīnabhavasaṃsārā pabhinnapaṭisambhidā;
analyzed: pahīna bhava saṃsārā pabhinna paṭisambhidā

original: Nāmarūpaṃ samāsanto pesalā chinnabandhanā.
analyzed: nāma rūpam pesalā chinna bandhanā

original: Sattānaṃ uttamaṃ santiṃ katvā ca janasaṅgahaṃ;
analyzed: uttamam santim katvā ca jana saṅgaham

original: Nibbutā te mahāpaññā padīpoca sumānasā.
analyzed: nibbutā te mahā paññā padīpoca su mānasā

original: Iti ariyajanappasādanatthāya kate dhātuvaṃse
analyzed: iti ariya jana ppasādana tthāya kate dhātuvaṃse

original: Dhātunidhānādhikāro nāma
analyzed: dhātunidhānādhikāraḥ nāma

original: Pañcamo paricchedo.
analyzed: pañcamo paricchedo

original: Iminā kārāpitavihārā kathetabbā; vihāradevīmahāvihāraṃ, chātapabbata vihāraṃ, samuddavihāraṃ,
analyzed: iminā kārāpita vihārā kathetabbā vihāradevī mahāvihāram chātapabbata vihāram samudda vihāram

original: cittalapabbatavihāraṃ, bhaddapāsāṇadvāravihāraṃ, acchagalla vihāraṃ, koḷambatissapabbatavihāraṃ,
analyzed: cittala pabbata vihāram bhadda pāsāṇa dvāra vihāram acchagalla vihāram koḷamba tissa pabbata vihāram

original: gaṇavihāraṃ, kālakavihāraṃ, dukkhapālaka vihāraṃ, uccaṅgaṇavihāraṃ, koṭitissavihāraṃ,
analyzed: gaṇa vihāram kālaka vihāram dukkhapālaka vihāram uccaṅgaṇa vihāram koṭitissa vihāram

original: tassa pana ekanāmaṃ katvā kārāpite mahāgāme tissamahāvihārādiṃ katvā ekasataaṭṭhavīsavihārāni katāni ahesuṃ.
analyzed: tassa pana eka nāmam katvā kārāpite mahā gāme tissa mahāvihāra ādim katvā eka sata aṭṭhavīsa vihārāni katāni ahesuṃ

original: Aṭṭhavīsaekasatavihārañca mahārahaṃ;
analyzed: aṭṭhavīsa eka sata vihārañca mahāraham

original: Vihāradeviyā saddhiṃ kārāpesi mahāyaso.
analyzed: vihāradeviyā saddhim kārāpesi mahāyasaḥ

original: Tato paṭṭhāya rājā mahādānaṃ datvā puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatti.
analyzed: tato paṭṭhāya rājā mahādānam da tvā puññāni katvā tato cutaḥ deva loke nibbatti

original: Katvāni puññakammāni anekāni mahāyaso;
analyzed: katvāni puññakammāni anekāni mahāyaso

original: Atthaṃ janassa katvāna gantvāna tusitaṃ puraṃ.
analyzed: attham janassa katvāna gantvāna tusitam puram

original: So tattha dibbasampattiṃ cīraṃ bhuñjiya nandito;
analyzed: so tattha dibba sampattim cīram bhuñjiya nandito

original: Mahāvībhavasampanno devatānaṃ purakkhato.
analyzed: mahā vībhava sampannaḥ devatānam purakkhataḥ

original: Tampi sampattimohāya jīvavaloke manorame;
analyzed: sampatti mohāya jīva va loke manorame

original: Lokuttaraṃ sivaṃ khemaṃ icchanto āgamissati.
analyzed: lokuttaram sivam khemam icchantaḥ āgamissati

original: So tato cuto jambudīpe nibbattitvā metteyya bhagavato pitā subrahmā nāma bhavissati.
analyzed: saḥ tato cutaḥ jambudīpe nibbattitvā metteyya bhagavato pitā subrahmā nāma bhavissati

original: Vihāradevī tasseva mātā brahmavatī nāma brāhmaṇī bhavissati. Abhayagāmaṇīkumāro tasseva

original: metteyyassa bhagavato paṭhamaggasāvako bhavissati. Kaniṭṭho saddhātisso dutiyaggasāvako bhavissati.
analyzed: metteyyassa bhagavataḥ paṭhamagga sāvakaḥ bhavissati kaniṭṭhaḥ saddhātissaḥ dutiyagga sāvakaḥ bhavissati

original: Ettāvatā nalāṭadhātu saṃvaṇṇanā samattā.
analyzed: ettāvatā nalāṭa dhātu saṃvaṇṇanā samattā

original: Dhātuvaṃso samatto.
analyzed: dhātu vaṃsaḥ samattaḥ

original: Anena puññakammena saṃsaranto bhavābhave;
analyzed: anena puñña kammena saṃsarantaḥ bhava abhave

original: Sabbattha paṇḍito homī sāriputtova paññavā.
analyzed: sabbattha paṇḍitaḥ homī sāriputtaḥ iva paññavā

original: Arimedassa buddhassa pabbajitvāna sāsane;
analyzed: arimedassa buddhassa pabbajitvāna sāsane

original: Nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvāna muñcemi bhavabandhanā.
analyzed: nibbānam pāpuṇitvāna muñcemi bhava bandhanā

original: Anena me sabbabhavābhave’haṃ,
analyzed: anena me

original: Bhaveyyamekantaparānukampī;
analyzed: bhaveyyam ekanta para anukampī

original: Kulī balī ceva satī matī ca,
analyzed: kulī balī ca iva satī matī ca

original: Kavīhisantehi sadā samaṅgī.
analyzed: sadā samaṅgī

original: Paññāvantānaṃ aggo bhavatu.
analyzed: paññāvantānam aggaḥ bhavatu
